programme.title: American Experience
programme.desc: Nixon. Part of the American Experience series on the presidents, this three-hour documentary examines the quest, triumph, fall, and legacy of one of America's most fascinating and controversial presidents. From his modest beginnings among the lemon groves in Yorba Linda, CA, to his taking on the highest position in the nation, the story of Richard Milhous Nixon is characterized by contradiction. A staunch anti-communist, Nixon opened up relations with China and the Soviet Union and took steps to end the conflict in Vietnam. American Experience describes how Nixon promoted family values and how he used his poker earnings to finance his first political campaign. From congressman to senator to vice president under Eisenhower, a man uncomfortable in his own skin, Nixon was nonetheless a tireless campaigner. The program details the "Pink Lady" campaign, the "Checkers" speech, and the humiliation of Watergate

programme.title: Honored to Serve

programme.title: Nightly Business Report
programme.desc: A long-running weeknight business-news magazine that includes market reports, company information, CEO interviews and economic commentary. programme.title: American Experience
programme.desc: JFK. A two-part profile of John F. Kennedy begins with his early years, detailing the health challenges he faced; his heroism after his PT boat was hit by an enemy destroyer during World War II; and his first run for Congress. Also: the 1960 presidential race, which featured the first televised presidential debates. Among those sharing insights: his sister Jean Kennedy Smith and niece Kathleen Kennedy Townsend; presidential biographers Robert A. Caro and Robert Dallek; and historian David Nasaw

programme.title: American Experience
programme.desc: JFK. Conclusion. John F. Kennedy's White House years are charted, including the Bay of Pigs fiasco; Cuban Missile Crisis; handling of civil rights; and decision to travel to Dallas on Nov. 22, 1963, to shore up support for the 1964 election. The successes and failures of his tenure in office are also weighed by Kennedy administration officials John Seigenthaler, Thomas Hughes and Harris Wofford; civil-rights leaders Andrew Young and Julian Bond; and journalists Evan Thomas and Richard Reeves

programme.title: American Experience
programme.desc: JFK. A two-part profile of John F. Kennedy begins with his early years, detailing the health challenges he faced; his heroism after his PT boat was hit by an enemy destroyer during World War II; and his first run for Congress. Also: the 1960 presidential race, which featured the first televised presidential debates. Among those sharing insights: his sister Jean Kennedy Smith and niece Kathleen Kennedy Townsend; presidential biographers Robert A. Caro and Robert Dallek; and historian David Nasaw

programme.title: American Experience
programme.desc: JFK. Conclusion. John F. Kennedy's White House years are charted, including the Bay of Pigs fiasco; Cuban Missile Crisis; handling of civil rights; and decision to travel to Dallas on Nov. 22, 1963, to shore up support for the 1964 election. The successes and failures of his tenure in office are also weighed by Kennedy administration officials John Seigenthaler, Thomas Hughes and Harris Wofford; civil-rights leaders Andrew Young and Julian Bond; and journalists Evan Thomas and Richard Reeves

programme.desc: Director McG takes the helm for the fourth instalment of the sci-fi action franchise, starring Christian Bale and Sam Worthington. The principal action takes place in the not-too-distant 2018, in the devastated world that was glimpsed early in the series, where a determined group of resistance fighters are battling killing machines that are set on sole control of the planet. John Connor is one of the resistance leaders who discovers that their Skynet robot adversaries have a potentially fatal design flaw; they also learn that Skynet plans to imminently assassinate the top resistance leaders; Connor is second on the kill list to Kyle Reese, a civilian whose significance is known only to Connor. programme.sub-title: Raindrops Keep Falling on My Head
programme.desc: Raindrops Keep Falling on My Head. Season Two of Grey's Anatomy picks up exactly where Season One left off, with the unexpected arrival at Seattle Grace Hospital of brilliant surgeon Addison Shepherd (Kate Walsh)--much to the dismay of Addison's estranged husband Dr. Derek Shepherd (Patrick Dempsey), to say nothing of Derek's current amour, surgical intern Meredith Grey (Ellen Pompeo). Naturally, Meredith feels betrayed by Derek, and keeps on feeling that way throughout the rest of the episode. Meanwhile, chief of surgery Dr. Webber (James Pickens Jr.) recovers from his operation with the special help of intern George O'Malley (T.R. Knight), who has been appointed official bearer of gossip from the hospital; and Meredith's friend and coworker Cristina Yang (Sandra Oh) has big news for her boss Dr. Preston Burke (Isaiah Washington)--and vice versa. Finally, arrogant intern Alex Karev (Justin Chambers) displays a hitherto untapped streak of compassion when the team's favorite bartender Joe suffers a heart attack

programme.title: Grey's Anatomy
programme.desc: Make Me Lose Control. Meredith (Ellen Pompeo) and Cristina (Sandra Oh) open the episode by cryin' the blues over getting romantically involved with their control-freak bosses. Back at Seattle Grace, Meredith's mom Ellis (Kate Burton), a brilliant surgeon struck down by Alzheimer's, is treated for diverticulitis--which unexpectedly becomes the catalyst for several revelations on the part of several secret lovers. Cristina resists the notion of telling Burke (Isaiah Washington) that she is pregnant, but this becomes a moot point when she collapses in the surgery room and Addison (Kate Walsh) is forced to perform an emergency operation. A young female patient (Angela Goethels) who suffers from uncontrollable blushing finds herself in the middle of a few interdepartmental intrigues. And George (T.R. Knight) is finally able to get the best of the insufferable Alex (Justin Chambers) when he is handed an unusally difficult assignment

programme.desc: One man's efforts to get ahead on the streets lead him into a life of danger in this hard-hitting urban drama from Roc-A-Fella Films, the production company run by top hip-hop artist Jay-Z. Beans (Beanie Sigel) is a member of a Philadelphia street gang who has had enough of his life of poverty. Determined to get ahead by any means available to him, Beans steps to the wrong side of the law and begins selling drugs. Forming a crew with his friends and fellow gangsters called the ABM ("All 'Bout the Money"), Beans and his partners soon become the new rulers of Philly's underground economy. But with success comes competition, and Untouchable J (Jay-Z) and Dame (Damon Dash), the leaders of an establish drug-dealing crew, decide the ABM are taking more than their share of the business, and begin retaliating with violence -- with both the ABM crew and Beans' wife as targets. State Property also stars Memphis Bleek, Omillio Sparks, and Sundy Carter

When asked for the company's phone number, he gives the number to Jerry's apartment and asks that Jerry answer his phone "Vandalay Industries" for the next few days, in case the Unemployment Office calls to confirm. Meanwhile, Jerry has become very close with his new male friend, New York Met Keith Hernandez. This doesn't sit well with Newman and Kramer, who claim Hernandez once spit on them after a game. Wayne Knight induces a case of déjà vu in a reenactment of the event that parodies the reenactment of the Kennedy assassination in Oliver Stone's JFK. Originally the first half of a one-hour episode, "The Boyfriend, Part 1" was later shown in syndication as the first episode of a two-parter. Airing February 12, 1992, the episode was the 15th one shot for the show's third season, despite being shown 17th

programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia

programme.title: The Twilight Zone
programme.desc: Long-Distance Call. The last of the six videotaped Twilight Zone installments of the 1960-61 season, this episode also featured the first of three series appearances by child actor Billy Mumy. In this one, Mumy plays Billy Bayles, a 5-year-old boy with a strong attachment to his grandmother (Lili Darvas). Using a toy telephone he'd received for his birthday, Billy communicates with his beloved Grandma -- several days and weeks after her death. Philip Abbott and Patricia Smith costar as Billy's distraught parents, who are convinced (rightly, as it turns out), that Grandma wants to inveigle the boy into joining her in the Next World. Cowritten by William Idelson and Charles Beaumont, "Long Distance Call" was originally telecast March 3, 1961

Nick Cannon stars as Alvin, a brilliant but awkward teenager -- and budding engineer -- who seizes a golden opportunity when popular cheerleader Paris (Christina Milian) wrecks her parents' SUV and is strapped for cash. They strike an agreement: Alvin will do the repairs for free if Paris pretend to be his girlfriend for two weeks, all in the hopes of elevating his social standing. programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky Loses His Temper. When Ricky (Desi Arnaz) blows his top after Lucy (Lucille Ball) purchases a new hat, Lucy bets him that he cannot hold his temper until she purchases another hat. Naturally, Lucy indulges in a variety of schemes to force Ricky into a tantrum so that she can win the bet -- she has her heart set on a new turquoise chapeau studded with pearls -- but Ricky refuses to bite. The situation is resolved (in a manner of speaking) by the timely arrival of a ventriloquist, played by veteran B-Western sidekick Max Terhune

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Home Movies. Ricky's home movies move the Mertzes to walk out, and prompt Lucy, Fred and Ethel to make a movie of their own, a "Western musical drama" shot in the Ricardo living room. That's not to be mixed up with a TV pilot Ricky's making, is it? Bennett Green: Stanley Farrar

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Bonus Bucks. A dollar bill takes a zany trip---with the Ricardos and Mertzes in hot pursuit. It's a winning bill (worth $300) in a newspaper contest. It belongs to Ricky, but he gallantly slips it into Lucy's purse. Gallant isn't necessarily smart: Lucy unthinkingly gives the bill to a grocery delivery boy---who gives it to Ethel in change. This wild ride has only begun. Laundryman: Tony Michaels. Grocery Boy: Don Garner

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Ricky's Hawaiian Vacation. When Ricky (Desi Arnaz) insists that he hasn't the money for a Hawaiian vacation, Lucy endeavors to win a free trip by submitting the story of her "miserable" life to a Strike It Rich-style game show called "Be a Good Neighbor." She even goes so far as to claim that she doesn't want the vacation for herself, but for the "impoverished" Mertzes and their elderly, grey-haired mother (actually Lucy in disguise). Figuring out what Lucy is up to, the show's prankish host Freddie Fillmore (Frank Nelson) conspires with Ricky to teach our heroine a lesson by subjecting her to all manner of on-camera pranks and practical jokes, leaving her soaking wet and splattered with eggs and pastry

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Is Envious. Who are those Martian women atop the Empire State Building? They're Lucy and Ethel, and they're there because Lucy needs money, $500, to be precise, to donate to charity. It seems she just can't say no to her rich ex-schoolmate (Mary Jane Croft), who's heading the drive. Al Sparks: Herbert Vigran. Henry: Dick Elliott. Martha: Kay Wiley. Elevator Operator: Louis A. Nicoletti

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy Writes a Novel. Lucy (Lucille Ball) takes it upon herself to write a novel titled "Real Gone With the Wind." Ricky (Desi Arnaz), Fred (William Frawley), and Ethel (Vivian Vance) are none too pleased to find that Lucy has based her main characters on them ("Nicky Nicardo," "Ethel Nurtz," etc.), and they try to burn the manuscript, to no avail. Then, much to everyone's amazement, a publisher evinces interest in Lucy's masterpiece -- or at least that's how it seems to the euphoric Lucy. However, as often happens on this show, things don't quite turn out as expected

programme.desc: First, Do No Harm. Frasier's new girlfriend has some quirky hang-ups. Guest starring Teri Hatcher(n)

programme.desc: Secret Admirer. Frasier mistakenly believes he is the object of a secret admirer while he is dating an attractive new woman(n)

programme.desc: How to Bury a Millionaire. Cash strapped Niles moves in with Frasier, driving him nuts. He is eventually forced to go apartment hunting but nothing quite matches his standards..(n)

programme.sub-title: The Seal Who Came to Dinner
programme.desc: The Seal Who Came to Dinner. Frasier and Niles host an exclusive dinner party at Maris' beach house, and discover a washed-up seal on the shore(n)

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Birth, Death, Love and Rice. Comedy drama following the lives of the regulars of a small bar in Boston. When Diane is stood-up, Sam offers her a job behind the bar(n)

programme.title: Cheers
programme.desc: Woody Goes Belly Up. Classic comedy drama set in a cosy Boston bar where everybody knows your name. Woody's ex-girlfriend arrives, and Frasier starts working at Cheers. S4, Ep2/26(n)

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Lucy's Club Dance. As part of a fund-raising strategy, the women's club to which Lucy (Lucille Ball) and Ethel (Vivian Vance) belong decides to organize an all-woman orchestra. At first, the musically disinclined Lucy is rejected by the orchestra, but she wangles a spot as a saxophonist by promising to arrange for the aggregation to be led by her husband, Ricky (Desi Arnaz). Alas, none of the ladies has anything remotely resembling talent, so it is up to Ricky to save the day -- and his reputation as a bona fide bandleader -- when the all-girl orchestra is booked for a professional engagement(n)

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Black Wig. Lucy plays a black-wigged temptress to test Ricky's fidelity. The result makes her see red, so she schemes to get even. But she won't divorce him. "Yeah, stay married to him," Ethel says. "That'll teach him." Roberta: Eve McVeagh. Doug: Douglas Evans. Waiter: Louis A. Nicoletti(n)

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Diner. When Ricky (Desi Arnaz) decides to get out of show business and into another line of work, Lucy (Lucille Ball) and the Mertzes (Vivian Vance, William Frawley) go along with the plan. The two couples invest heavily in a local diner called "Bill's Place," which the owner, Mr. Wilson (James Burke), has assured them is a gold mine. Suffice to say that not only is the diner a bottomless money pit, but the Ricardos and the Mertzes are run ragged trying to handle all the work themselves -- and worse still, an argument results in the couples splitting the diner down the middle into two equally unprofitable eateries(n)

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Tennessee Ernie Visits. In a strategy designed to boost the slightly flagging ratings of I Love Lucy, the series offered its first two-part story, built around the talents of guest star Tennessee Ernie Ford. In part one, the Ricardos extend their hospitality to a cousin of a friend of Lucy's mother, a bucolic fellow named Ernie who hails from Bent Fork, TN. Though Ernie is friendly and likeable, he soon becomes quite a pest, especially when he insists upon singing early in the morning and waking up the entire apartment building. To get rid of Ernie, Lucy (Lucille Ball) tries to scare him off by disguising herself as one of those "wicked city wimmen" that Ernie's mother has warned him about(n)

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: Tennessee Ernie Hangs On. In the conclusion of a two-part story, the Ricardos are at their wits' end trying to figure out some way to get rid of their troublesome hillbilly house guest, Cousin Ernie (Tennessee Ernie Ford). After several misfired schemes, Lucy (Lucille Ball) conspires with Ricky (Desi Arnaz), Fred (William Frawley), and Ethel (Vivian Vance) to convince Ernie that the Ricardos have gone broke and can no longer afford to feed him. But generous Ernie decides to help out his hosts -- and the Mertzes -- by dressing them up as rubes and wangling a musical guest spot on "Millikan's Chicken Mash Hour," a TV show hosted by another of Ernie's unlimited supply of city cousins!(n)

programme.title: I Love Lucy
programme.desc: The Golf Game. Tired of being golf widows, Lucy and Ethel take up the game themselves. But that's more "togetherness" than Ricky and Fred want, so they invent a set of crazy rules to discourage them. Pro Jimmy Demeret (playing himself) sets them straight and before long, Ricky has a red-headed caddy. Tournament Announcer: Louis A. Nicoletti. Caddy: George Pirrone(n)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Son-in-Law Dearest. Dorothy is dismayed when her daughter is too forgiving of her unfaithful husband(n)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: To Catch a Neighbor. The girls are shocked to learn that their "nice" neighbors, the McDowells, are suspected of dealing in stolen gems. A pair of police detectives use the girls' home to stake out the McDowells, leading to various intrigues involving secret microphones, human decoys, and an apparently hopeless crush on the older of the two cops. And, yes, that young and callow police officer is indeed played by a pre-ER George Clooney -- who, ironically, needs a doctor himself by episode's end(n)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: A Piece of Cake. While preparing a birthday party for one of Sophia's (Estelle Getty) friends, the girls reminisce about past birthday celebrations of their own. Highlights in this flashback episode include the tumultuous 50th birthday party for Sophia's dear departed husband, Sal (played by Sid Melton, best remembered as Charlie Halper on the old Danny Thomas Show), and Rose's (Betty White) surprise bash for Dorothy (Bea Arthur) at Mr. Ha Ha's Hot Dog Hacienda. But the fondest memories are recalled by Blanche (Rue McClanahan), as she conjures up visions of several big birthday surprises -- all of them wearing pants(n)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Empty Nest. The girls try to help their friend and neighbor Renee Corliss (Rita Moreno), who is down in the dumps of late. It seems that all of Renee's children have moved out of the house, and her doctor husband, George (Paul Dooley), is too busy with his practice to pay her any attention. This final episode of The Golden Girls' 1986-1987 season is also the pilot episode of the TV sitcom Empty Nest -- which would not debut until 1988, and then with an entirely different cast (with the exception of actor David Leisure)(n)

programme.title: Home & Family
programme.desc: Sarah Michelle Gellar prepares treats for movie night; Craig Wayne Boyd performs; finalists in the Next Fitness Star contest visit; Debbie prepares a recipe. Also: dorm-room necessities; homemade infinity scarves; an Olympic Games puzzle; nursery murals(n)

programme.title: Home & Family
programme.desc: Brian McKnight performs; Robin Lively and Sloane Morgan Siegel discuss "Gortimer Gibbon's Life on Normal Street"; Shay Shull prepares cheeseburger meatballs. Also: homemade bathroom storage; handmade pressed-flower phone cases; the science of ice(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A Christmas They Never Forgot. Snowed in by a Christmas blizzard, the Ingalls family, including married daughters Laura (Melissa Gilbert) and Mary (Melissa Sue Anderson) and their respective husbands, Almanzo (Dean Butler) and Adam (Linwood Boomer), pass the time by telling stories about their lives. Also on hand is family friend Hester-Sue (Ketty Lester), who imparts a fascinating yarn of her own. This episode features excerpts from the 1974 Little House on the Prairie TV-movie pilot(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: No Beast So Fierce. James' promising friendship with a young stuttering boy named Gideon Hale is jeopardized when he mocks the boy behind his back(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Stone Soup. A pregnant Laura (Melissa Gilbert) insists that she can take care of the Wilders' farm in the absence of her husband, Almanzo (Dean Butler). Unfortunately, the land is hit with a drought, and Laura is felled by a heat stroke. It's up to the local schoolchildren to save the crops -- not to mention Laura's own, carefully tended orchard. The title of this episode refers to the famous fable of the same name, used in the story as a means of instilling maturity in perennial classroom troublemaker Willie Oleson (Jonathan Gilbert)(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The Legacy. Old blueprints are unearthed, as well as a surprise - Charles was the designer. He took up caibinet-making to earn an income that would become his family's inheritance, but this design was stolen(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Eve's Boyfriend. Alarm bells ring when the clan learn that Eve and her new boyfriend will be attending the same overnight camping trip(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Project Mandy. Mike is far from happy when Mandy quits college to pursue a fashion career. Input from Grandpa Bud only makes the situation worse(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Hard-Ass Teacher. Important lessons are learned when Eve tries to switch maths teachers because hers has a reputation for being tough(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Parenting Bud. After Bud is attacked while unloading a truck at his recreational-marijuana shop, Mike reluctantly must admit that his father is getting old and tries to come up with suggestions on how Bud can better protect himself. Later, Vanessa has a discussion with the girls about how they may need to take care of her and Mike when they reach a certain age(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: April, Come She Will. Vanessa's freeloading sister visits, and true to form, she's looking for a donation to her nest egg, since she's decided to have a child and needs money for a donor egg. Meanwhile at work, Mike pulls a prank on Chuck Larabee(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mutton Busting. In the third-season finale, Boyd enters a mutton-busting competition at a rodeo. Elsewhere, Eve and her boyfriend don't see eye-to-eye on her prom attire(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: The Concert. Frankie does everything she can to get Sue tickets to a Justin Bieber concert. Mike works with Brick as he prepares for the school spelling bee. Axl and his friends are determined to break the posted 15-mile-per-hour speed limit, only on foot(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: The Sit Down. After a family meeting, Frankie and Mike agree to let the kids be responsible for the things they're supposed to do without interference from them(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: Leap Year. Sue's birthday is February 29 and, since this year is leap year, she has high hopes for a big celebration. Frankie finds out that tough guy Mike has a pet cat at work. While Brick becomes enamored with a cute girl at school, Axl is spellbound by the vacuum cleaner(n)

programme.title: The Middle
programme.desc: The Paper Route. Brick becomes Orson's newest paperboy when he needs to save up for a pair of night-vision goggles. Axl has some brotherly advice for a despairing Sue(n)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Son-in-Law Dearest. Dorothy is dismayed when her daughter is too forgiving of her unfaithful husband(n)

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: To Catch a Neighbor. The girls are shocked to learn that their "nice" neighbors, the McDowells, are suspected of dealing in stolen gems. A pair of police detectives use the girls' home to stake out the McDowells, leading to various intrigues involving secret microphones, human decoys, and an apparently hopeless crush on the older of the two cops. And, yes, that young and callow police officer is indeed played by a pre-ER George Clooney -- who, ironically, needs a doctor himself by episode's end(n)

programme.title: Norman Saves the World
programme.desc: Searching for a way to get Mickey out of prison, Ray turns to an old opponent to secure a bartering chip in the form of a less-than-wholesome family comedy star. A long-buried scandal leads Ray to an unexpected confrontation with a slick Hollywood agent and a former fixer of Ezra's. Meanwhile, without the protection of the Russians, Ray must help Mickey secure his own safety and gain admittance to the secure K6G prison wing

programme.title: Carpet Season
programme.desc: Bill, Reg and Phil set off on a quest to retrieve Christopher's stolen iPad. Meanwhile, a famously idiosyncratic rock photographer arrives to shoot the band, causing chaos backstage

programme.title: Norman Saves the World
programme.desc: Searching for a way to get Mickey out of prison, Ray turns to an old opponent to secure a bartering chip in the form of a less-than-wholesome family comedy star. programme.title: Carpet Season
programme.desc: Bill, Reg and Phil set off on a quest to retrieve Christopher's stolen iPad. Meanwhile, a famously idiosyncratic rock photographer arrives to shoot the band, causing chaos backstage(c)

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Based on actual events, a group of US soldiers is sent on a heroic mission to Somalia in 1993 as part of a UN peacekeeping operation. They must capture the top lieutenants of a Somali warlord, in order to quell the civil war and famine that is ravaging the country. Directed by Ridley Scott

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as an American soldier, who decides to leave the military and compete in a famous Hong Kong martial arts tournament that is a notoriously dangerous fight to the death

programme.title: The War
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars as a Vietnam vet who has high hopes of rebuilding his life in this heartwarming tale of a close-knit family, set in Mississippi during the summer of 1970. Elijah Wood also stars as his son

programme.title: Dennis Rodman's Big Bang in Pyongyang
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling flamboyant celebrity and former NBA basketballer Dennis Rodman's friendship with leader Kim Jong-un that sends him on a controversial mission to improve relations between North Korea and the US by staging a historic basketball game between the two countries. Despite nuclear threats, dissent and Rodman's personal struggles to keep it together, the game must go on

programme.title: 1492: Conquest of Paradise
programme.desc: Epic historical drama directed by Ridley Scott that revolves around Christopher Columbus' famed journey, from convincing the Spanish queen to finance his expedition to setting sail, quelling potential mutinies and a triumphant return home only to find that his dream of a peaceful new world clashes with a Spanish nobleman's visions of conquest. Stars Gerard Depardieu and Sigourney Weaver

programme.title: Bronx Obama
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of a middle-aged, unemployed Puerto Rican father from the Bronx who shaves his beard to discover he looks remarkably like Barack Obama, and decides to cash in on the look of a lifetime by becoming an impersonator, which takes him on a journey across the world and threatens to divide his family

programme.title: Match
programme.desc: Patrick Stewart stars as a master dance teacher and choreographer with a lifetime of memories, who is interviewed by a young couple and unexpectedly forced to confront the painful decisions he thought he left in the past

programme.title: Shopgirl
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Steve Martin, Claire Danes and Jason Schwartzman about a complex love triangle between a bored salesgirl, a wealthy businessman and an aimless young man. Based on the novel by Steve Martin

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse

programme.title: Carpet Season
programme.desc: Bill, Reg and Phil set off on a quest to retrieve Christopher's stolen iPad. Meanwhile, a famously idiosyncratic rock photographer arrives to shoot the band, causing chaos backstage(c)

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: War
programme.desc: A grieving FBI agent is bent on avenging the death of his partner by hunting down the assassin that pulled the trigger, but uncovers some disturbing secrets on his crusade for justice. Jason Statham and Jet Li star in this stylish action thriller with John Lone

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: Colin Firth and Nicole Kidman star in this drama about a former British Army officer, who was tormented as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, and sets out many years later to confront the man responsible

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Classic romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts as a world famous movie star, who finds an unlikely connection with a troubled bookstore owner in the eclectic London neighborhood of Notting Hill. Co-stars Hugh Grant

programme.title: Compared to What? The Improbable Journey of Barney Frank
programme.desc: Documentary that goes inside the public private life of one of America's most outspoken politicians, Barney Frank. Combining forty years of rare and archival material with interviews, this intimate portrait follows Frank from the Halls of Congress to the streets of Boston and to the taking of his wedding vows, as he becomes the first Member of Congress to enter into a same sex marriage

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: A former Navy SEAL seeks revenge after a nightclub owner attacks his wife but when a bounty is placed on his head in retaliation, he must escape LA while being pursued by every criminal, wise guy and thug in town

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: Colin Firth and Nicole Kidman star in this drama about a former British Army officer, who was tormented as a prisoner of war at a Japanese labor camp during World War II, and sets out many years later to confront the man responsible

programme.title: Notting Hill
programme.desc: Classic romantic comedy starring Julia Roberts as a world famous movie star, who finds an unlikely connection with a troubled bookstore owner in the eclectic London neighborhood of Notting Hill. Co-stars Hugh Grant

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Cate Blanchett is a small-town psychic named Annie, a widow using her clairvoyance to support herself and her sons. When she has visions involving the death of a local party girl (Katie Holmes), she suspects Donnie (Keanu Reeves), a violent wife beater. Sure enough, the victim's body is recovered in Donnie's pond, but is Annie interpreting her visions correctly, or is a killer still on the loose?

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

programme.title: The Giver
programme.desc: Haunting futuristic tale about a young man living in a colorless, bland utopia, who meets the Giver, an older man who keeps the memories of the past, and opens his eyes to see the dangerous truth about the world he is living in. Stars Meryl Streep, Jeff Bridges and Katie Holmes

programme.title: Catch Hell
programme.desc: Ryan Phillippe directs and stars as a washed up Hollywood actor, who is kidnapped by two men connected to his past while on location in Louisiana, and finds himself in the middle of a twisted scheme with little chance to survive

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A popular high school student is forced to hit the road after the brutal murder of his parents, setting him on a path to the ominous town of Lupine Ridge to find out the truth of his ancestry

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: When a giant meteor is set to strike earth, humanity's only hope is a weapons' engineer but when he's kidnapped by a cult leader who is hoping for the world's demise, a convicted killer and a special agent must join forces to rescue him. Stars Ice-T

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: In this cult horror classic, five friends pick up a traumatized young hitchhiker, and find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chain saw-wielding killer and his family of psychopaths

programme.title: Amigo Undead
programme.desc: In this comic horror movie, two estranged brothers reunite at a birthday party in the woods but when the partygoers awaken an ancient demonic force, the brothers must find a way to put aside their differences in order to escape

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars as a mutated mariner in a futuristic dystopia where the polar ice caps have melted and the earth is almost entirely submerged, forcing him to battle starvation and outlaws while reluctantly helping a woman and a child try to find dry land

programme.title: Stake Land
programme.desc: When an epidemic of vampirism strikes and his family is slaughtered, young Martin (Connor Paolo) is taken under the wing of a grizzled, wayward hunter (Nick Damici) whose new prey are the undead. Simply known as Mister, the vampire stalker takes Martin on a journey through the locked-down towns of America's heartland, searching for a better place to call home while taking down any bloodsuckers that cross their path

programme.title: Halloween: Resurrection
programme.desc: The eighth installment in the popular, long-running horror film series finds masked supernatural killer Michael Myers back to haunt his now-institutionalized sister (Jamie Lee Curtis) as well as the six teenagers spending the night in his family home as a reality-show Internet stunt. Busta Rhymes, Tyra Banks, Ryan Merriman, Thomas Ian Nicholas and Sean Patrick Thomas costar in this freaky follow-up from "Halloween 2" director Rick Rosenthal

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Ten killers sentenced to death for their murderous crimes are flown to a remote island and pitted against each other in a lethal series of fights, with the ultimate victor winning his freedom as the grand prize. Steve Austin, Vinnie Jones, Robert Mammone and Rick Hoffman star in this bone-cracking, hard-driving action thriller

programme.title: Let Us Prey
programme.desc: A rookie cop in a remote Scottish police station encounters a supernatural force that takes over the minds and souls of the cops and crooks, forcing them to fight for their lives against an unholy power

programme.title: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre
programme.desc: In this cult horror classic, five friends pick up a traumatized young hitchhiker, and find themselves stalked and hunted by a deformed chain saw-wielding killer and his family of psychopaths

programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars as a mutated mariner in a futuristic dystopia where the polar ice caps have melted and the earth is almost entirely submerged, forcing him to battle starvation and outlaws while reluctantly helping a woman and a child try to find dry land

programme.title: Willow Creek
programme.desc: A young couple find themselves face-to-face against a terrifying evil when they venture into the remote woods of Bigfoot country to research the existence of the infamous ape

programme.title: Seventh Moon
programme.desc: American newlyweds honeymooning in China discover a legendary ancient custom that comes back to haunt them in a remote village

programme.title: The Rocketeer
programme.desc: Set in a pulp comic styled glamorous 1930s, a down-on-his-luck pilot stumbles upon an incredible invention -- a top-secret jetpack -- but before long, a sinister spy interferes and the pilot must embark on a thrilling and dangerous mission. Stars Timothy Dalton and Jennifer Connelly

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: An urban fairy tale set in Manchester about a young boy whose tragic life takes an unexpected turn one Christmas Eve after he meets a mysterious stranger, who takes him on a journey of discovery that will change his destiny. Stars Eddie Izzard

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: A young whiz kid's dreams comes true when he gets an invitation to space camp, where he gets a chance to compete with other brainiacs but the contest takes a turn when he must use his smarts to deal with a real-life disaster. Stars Mira Sorvino and Danny Glover

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: Set in a future where a failed climate-change experiment kills all life on the planet, a lucky few board a train that endlessly circles the icy globe but with a cruel and dangerous class hierarchy separating the front from the back passengers, a rebel hero stirs up a riot to challenge the system. Features an all-star cast, including Tilda Swinton, Octavia Spencer, Chris Evans and John Hurt

programme.title: Seventh Moon
programme.desc: American newlyweds honeymooning in China discover a legendary ancient custom that comes back to haunt them in a remote village

programme.title: Good Luck Chuck
programme.desc: A dentist (Dane Cook) who is also a lifelong bachelor suddenly realizes at an ex-girlfriend's wedding that every woman he's ever slept with has found her true love with the very next man she dated - making him instant catnip to ladies only interested in benefiting from his "curse." Jessica Alba and Dan Fogler costar in this romantic comedy

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims

programme.title: Bloodworx
programme.desc: When two college friends sign up for a pharmaceutical test to make some quick cash, they find themselves in a remote hospital facility in the grips of a deadly government experiment

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: A young couple live in a broken-down car parked alongside Chicago's Lincoln Park Zoo, spending their days in a ritual of scamming, thieving and scoring heroine to feed their addiction until they must confront the difficult truth about their relationship

programme.title: Boom
programme.desc: Marty and Jeannie put their plan into action to pit rival clients against one another, but things do not go as smoothly as planned. Changes at Galweather promise trouble for Jeannie. Clyde's already difficult work situation under Monica becomes even more brutal when he is forced to work from her home(c)

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Comedy-drama based on the acclaimed novel about an English professor (Michael Douglas) who can't stop writing his new manuscript while he grapples over the holidays with his pregnant mistress (Frances McDormand), a gifted but troubled student (Tobey Maguire), a beautiful houseguest (Katie Holmes), a stolen car and his high-pressure, gay editor (Robert Downey Jr.). Rip Torn and Richard Thomas costar in this acclaimed, Oscar-winning film from the director of "L.A. Confidential."

programme.title: Lost in the Sun
programme.desc: A small time criminal past finds an unlikely accomplice in a newly orphaned teenage boy, conning him into a dangerous cross country trip where they undertake a series of robberies and hope the past won't catch up with them

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar(R) winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones

programme.title: W. Kamau Bell: Semi-Prominent Negro
programme.desc: Comedy special featuring socio-political comedian W. Kamau Bell, who brings his characteristically biting and hilarious take on the real issues of contemporary America from gentrification to raising his family in a post-Obama nation. Morgan Spurlock directs

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: House Not Home
programme.desc: A gender fluid teenager navigates bullying and violence from peers and rejection from a parent on the journey out of the closet. Directed by Joshua Butler and written by teen Skyler Edge

programme.title: Tart
programme.desc: A spoiled New York City high school student (Dominique Swain) experiments with sex, drugs and murder at a luxurious country estate, along with her rich friends and the boy (Brad Renfro) of her fantasies in this stark coming-of-age drama costarring Bijou Phillips and Mischa Barton

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar(R) winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation

Rip Torn and Richard Thomas costar in this acclaimed, Oscar-winning film from the director of "L.A. Confidential."

programme.desc: A small time criminal past finds an unlikely accomplice in a newly orphaned teenage boy, conning him into a dangerous cross country trip where they undertake a series of robberies and hope the past won't catch up with them

programme.title: Angels of Darkness
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a woman and her estranged father who go behind the Iron Curtain to a small Hungarian town where strange events unfold. From withering crops to dying farm animals and the local young women going mad -- they must find out if there's a darker secret behind the mass hysteria destroying the town. Stars Stephen Rea

programme.title: Associates
programme.desc: Marty deals with his newest clients, hip-hop clothing moguls Dre Collins and Lukas Frye, who have divergent attitudes and plans for their company, DollaHyde. Jeannie defines the role she'll play in her new position. Clyde goes through some personal hard times and turns to Marty for help(c)

programme.title: Hostel: Part II
programme.desc: A trio of American art students are trapped at a high-price, top-secret retreat where wealthy clients satisfy their bloodlust in this terrifying, blackly comic sequel from director Eli Roth, starring Lauren German, Bijou Phillips and Heather Matarazzo

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: In this chilling supernatural tale, a talented young photographer with a disfiguring birthmark discovers a world of reptilian monsters posing as street gangs on the streets of London, who inflict violence on the innocent and offer him everything he's ever dreamed of, but at a deadly price

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen

programme.title: Passion Of Mind
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars in this romantic fantasy as two very different women who seem to be the same person in two different places, France and New York. Is each the figment of the other's imagination, or is something more powerful and wonderfully supernatural going on? William Fichtner, Joss Ackland, Peter Riegert and Stellan Skarsgard costar in this moving, memorable film from French director Alain Berliner ("Ma Vie en Rose")

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: A young boy on the cusp of manhood becomes the focus of a long-running war between factions of werewolves in this gritty horror fantasy starring Jason Behr, Matthew Knight, Rhona Mitra and Elias Koteas

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: Five teens journey into a mysterious forest for an evening of flashlight games and ghost stories but their plans go awry when they awaken a demonic presence that seizes upon their deepest fears

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment

programme.title: Jonah Hill / Alan Arkin
programme.desc: Host David Steinberg interviews big stars and living legends as they share never-before-heard anecdotes, intimate memories, and career-defining moments from the past five decades of comedy. This week's guests: Jonah Hill and Alan Arkin(c)

programme.title: The Dramatics (A Comedy)
programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar® winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber

programme.title: Ben Gleib: Neurotic Gangster
programme.desc: Satirical comedian Ben Gleib, dubbed the "next big thing" on Esquire's comedian list, performs his first one-hour comedy special where he tackles social media, singledom, vegetarians and everything in between

programme.title: Unnatural
programme.desc: James Remar and Sherilyn Fenn star in this horror flick about a morally ambiguous corporation that experiments with genetic modification, resulting in the creation of a man-hunting creature who escapes and terrorizes an unsuspecting community of cabin dwellers in a horrifying game of cat and mouse

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: A group of gay activists work to support the miners of a tiny Welsh village during their lengthy strike in the summer of 1984. Inspired by an extraordinary true story

programme.title: Sex with the Ex
programme.desc: A freshman thinks she's met the love of her life when she starts dating a handsome football player until she finds herself the butt of a giant fraternity joke - but when the footballer returns to her life a few years later, will she give him a second chance?

programme.title: Stretch and Bobbito: Radio That Changed Lives
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two quirky friends who became unlikely legends by hosting a radio show that introduced the world to the biggest hip-hop artists of the 90s, including Nas, Biggie, Wu-Tang, Jay-Z, Eminem and the Fugees. Includes interviews with the rap world's luminaries

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: A group of gay activists work to support the miners of a tiny Welsh village during their lengthy strike in the summer of 1984. Inspired by an extraordinary true story

programme.title: Mr. Holland's Opus
programme.desc: Richard Dreyfuss stars in this sentimental favorite as an aspiring composer who settles uncomfortably into a 30-year career as a high school music teacher, struggling to achieve his dreams while raising a deaf son and only slowly realizing the impact he has had on generations of students. Glenne Headly and Olympia Dukakis costar in this heartwarming drama

programme.title: Atari: Game Over
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the rise, fall and burial of the Atari Corporation told through the lens of the filmmakers unearthing hundred of thousands of unsold "E.T." game cartridges that were buried in a small town of New Mexico

programme.title: Deterrence
programme.desc: While he's trapped in a diner during a freak Colorado snowstorm, the U.S. President (Kevin Pollak) debates strategy with his senior staff during an international crisis provoked by Iraq. Sean Astin, Timothy Hutton and Sheryl Lee Ralph costar in this debut feature from writer-director Rod Lurie ("The Contender")

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: Beautiful Girls
programme.desc: During a visit to his Massachusetts home town, a professional piano player (Timothy Hutton) gets involved with both a sexy fellow visitor (Uma Thurman) and the alluring teenager (Natalie Portman) now living next door to his childhood home. Also stars Matt Dillon, Rosie O'Donnel and Mira Sorvino

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Mathew Broderick stars as an uptight man who is stranded in a city where a year earlier, had too many drinks and had an unexpected encounter that haunts him. With his female coworker at his side, he sets out to figure out what happened that night. Directed by Neil Labute

programme.title: Boyhood
programme.desc: Filmed over 12 years with the same cast, this groundbreaking Richard Linklater film is the story of growing up seen through the eyes of a boy who literally goes from a child to a young adult before our eyes. Features Patricia Arquette in her Oscar® winning role with Ethan Hawke and Ellar Coltrane

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After a lifetime of training in swordsmanship and hand-to-hand combat, the world's most dangerous fighter flees his homeland to start a new life in the American west. But soon the hunter becomes the hunted, and the legendary warrior must wage a fierce, all-out battle against a renegade gang of outlaws and a pack of murderous assassins from his past. Stars Kate Bosworth and Academy Award® winner Geoffrey Rush

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Based on the true story of a former drug-dealing criminal who undergoes an astonishing transformation and finds his unexpected calling in war-torn Sudan by leading armed missions into enemy territory to rescue kidnapped children

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: A group of successful college friends reunite for a wedding, but when one of the bridesmaids gets her hands on the best man's steamy new novel about to hit bookstores, a series of scandals about the friends are revealed that wreak havoc on their relationships. Stars Taye Diggs and Nia Long

programme.title: Best in Sex: 2016 AVN Awards
programme.desc: The hottest adult stars and top adult movies are celebrated at this awards ceremony known as the "Oscars of porn" presented at the Hard Rock Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas, where everything from Best New Starlet, Best Girl on Girl Scene and Most Epic Ass are paid tribute to

programme.title: Pauly Shore Stands Alone
programme.desc: Touching and funny documentary following comedian Pauly Shore on tour as he plays venues in small towns across the mid-west, entertaining his loyal fans. Between hilarious standup clips, Shore deals with his ailing mother and reflects on his life outside of comedy, giving a rare glimpse into the man behind the persona

programme.title: Animals
programme.desc: A young couple live in a broken-down car parked alongside Chicago's Lincoln Park Zoo, spending their days in a ritual of scamming, thieving and scoring heroine to feed their addiction until they must confront the difficult truth about their relationship
A free-for-all, no-rules round-table with panelists Robert Klein, Jonathan Winters and Rick Overton(c)

programme.title: Shopgirl
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Steve Martin, Claire Danes and Jason Schwartzman about a complex love triangle between a bored salesgirl, a wealthy businessman and an aimless young man. Based on the novel by Steve Martin

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: This highly acclaimed, Oscar(R) winning independent drama marked the extraordinary sophomore effort of writer and director Sofia Coppola, who crafts a resonant, understated drama about a movie star (Bill Murray) visiting Tokyo to appear in a liquor commercial, who befriends the lonely, hotel-bound wife (Scarlett Johansson) of a celebrity photographer. Together, the two lost, culturally adrift, insomniac Americans become platonic soul mates, exploring the city and discovering a kindred spirit to combat their shared isolation

programme.title: Freedom
programme.desc: Two men are separated by time and united by their search for freedom in this tale of a slave escaping via the underground railroad in the 1800s and a sea captain setting sail one hundred year's earlier, with a ship full of slaves that will set in a motion an unstoppable legacy. Stars Cuba Gooding Jr

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: A madcap dramatic comedy about a self-induced attention-deficit disordered, learning disabled, Tourette's syndrome suffering, balance impaired, ex-alcoholic young man from the Upper East Side of Manhattan and the woman who inspires him to try to get it together

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: As I AM: The Life and Times of DJ AM
programme.desc: Documentary about the late, great mash-up pioneer DJ AM that charts his meteoric rise, his long-running struggle with addiction, his tabloid romances and his untimely death. Includes live sets, plus interviews with Jon Favreau, Mark Ronson, Mix Master Mike, Samantha Ronson and many others

programme.title: Miles To Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: Short documentary chronicling the true story of famed musicians and the relationships they have with their roadies. Features music legends Chad Smith (Red Hot Chili Peppers), Chris Shiflett (Foo Fighters) and Jim James (My Morning Jacket), who speak candidly about their time on the road and the importance of the crew who work tirelessly to put the show together, as well as capturing a day behind-the-scenes with the crew of Pearl Jam

programme.title: Shopgirl
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Steve Martin, Claire Danes and Jason Schwartzman about a complex love triangle between a bored salesgirl, a wealthy businessman and an aimless young man. Based on the novel by Steve Martin

programme.title: The Seven Five
programme.desc: Documentary that goes inside the minds of the crooked cops who brazenly started their own criminal empire in East New York during the crack cocaine explosion of the late 80s and early 90s, lead by "the dirtiest cop ever" Michael Dowd. Packed with interviews with those who broke the law and those who protected it, in what turned out to be the biggest police corruption scandal in New York City history

programme.title: Jermaine Fowler: Give'em Hell Kid
programme.desc: Comedian Jermaine Fowler performs his first ever stand-up special, dissecting his life in hilarious detail from his childhood to dealing with Internet trolls and his "special" brother

programme.title: Color Of Night
programme.desc: A psychologist (Bruce Willis) takes over a therapy group that may be hiding his best friend's murderer, while simultaneously embarking on a sizzling sexual affair with a young woman (Jane March) who's concealing shocking secrets of her own. Scott Bakula, Lesley Ann Warren, Lance Henriksen, Ruben Blades, Brad Dourif and Eriq La Salle costar in this erotic thriller

programme.title: Beyond The Law
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars in this action drama as a renegade cop haunted by memories of torturous childhood abuse, who is recruited to infiltrate a ring of weapons-smuggling bikers. Linda Fiorentino and Michael Madsen costar with Courtney B. Vance and Rip Torn

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: In this tech caper, an all-star cast of renegade computer hackers are blackmailed by the government into stealing a code-breaking machine from a mathematician but after the job is done, they realize they've got themselves into far more than they bargained for. Features Robert Redford, River Phoenix, Sidney Poitier and Dan Aykroyd

programme.title: Maz Jobrani: I'm Not a Terrorist But I've Played One on TV
programme.desc: Comedian Maz Jobrani follows up his bestselling book with a hilarious comedy special of the same title, where he takes on political issues, social issues and his kids through the lens of his Iranian-American background to show that we have a lot more in common than we think

programme.title: Dirty Pretty Things
programme.desc: An illegal immigrant from Nigeria works at a West London hotel where nefarious business is constantly underway but when he discovers a human heart in one of the toilets, he is lured into a dangerous pact that could offer him a chance at a better life. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor and Audrey Tatou

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: In this tense, psychological thriller based on the notorious true story, Billy Crudup stars as a Stanford University professor who, in 1971, cast 24 student volunteers as prisoners and guards in a simulated jail to examine the source of abusive behavior in the prison system with astonishing results that reveal the dark side of power and the effects of imprisonment

programme.title: Turbulence 3
programme.desc: In this action packed drama, a rock superstar decides to stage his final show aboard a jumbo jet, broadcasting the gig live to millions of fans over the Internet, but he didn't count on a deranged fan with a gun who hijacks the plane, throwing the show and the passengers lives into lethal chaos

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: From writer and director Craig Brewer comes this offbeat, Southern Gothic drama about a wild, nymphomaniacal young woman (Christina Ricci) who is imprisoned and broken of her "wickedness" by a kindly blues guitarist (Samuel L. Jackson), even as both suffer in different ways from loneliness and heartache. Justin Timberlake, S. Epatha Merkerson, David Banner and Clare Grant costar in this strange but riveting character study

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Showtime Championship Boxing: Garcia vs. Salka (R) (?)
Steve-O: Guilty As Charged
programme.desc: Comedy special starring comedian, author and all-round lunatic Steve-O, who went from humble beginnings as a circus clown to hitting the big time in 'Jackass'. Expect the unexpected as he performs hilariously outrageous stunts and riotous tricks that hold nothing back

programme.title: Basic Instinct 2
programme.desc: Sharon Stone returns to the role that made her a star in this sexy sequel that finds best-selling crime novelist Catherine Tramell under suspicion for murder once again, this time for the death of a high-profile British athlete. When Scotland Yard criminal psychologist Dr. Michael Glass (David Morrissey) is assigned to profile Tramell, however, he finds himself drawn irresistibly into her web of seduction and lies. David Thewlis also stars in this sizzling thriller from director Michael Caton-Jones ("This Boy's Life," "Rob Roy")

programme.title: Mercenaries
programme.desc: When the president's daughter is captured and imprisoned while touring a war zone, a team of elite female commandos is assembled to infiltrate a women's prison and undertake a daring rescue

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring

programme.title: The Who Live In Hyde Park
programme.desc: Documentary featuring The Who's performance at Hyde Park as part of their 50th anniversary tour, as well as original interviews with Pete Townshend and Roger Daltrey reflecting on their lives together, plus others like Iggy Pop

programme.title: The Alamo (2004)
programme.desc: Academy Awards® winners Billy Bob Thornton and Dennis Quaid star in this historical epic set in 19th century Texas during the famed siege of Alamo, where a group of men led by Colonel Travis, along with Davey Crockett and Jim Bowie, fought against the odds, for the independence of Texas

programme.title: Underclassman
programme.desc: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: Robert DeNiro and John Travolta star as two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- who find their unlikely friendship tested when one of them reveals their true intentions

programme.title: Mindhunters
programme.desc: In this psychological action-thriller, an elite group of the FBI's most talented young agents, skilled in reading the minds of elusive serial killers, is being intensively trained on a remote island. But they soon learn that there is a killer among them and they must find a way to get out alive. Stars Christian Slater and Val Kilmer

programme.title: The Who Live In Hyde Park
programme.desc: Documentary featuring The Who's performance at Hyde Park as part of their 50th anniversary tour, as well as original interviews with Pete Townshend and Roger Daltrey reflecting on their lives together, plus others like Iggy Pop

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: After a lifetime of training in swordsmanship and hand-to-hand combat, the world's most dangerous fighter flees his homeland to start a new life in the American west. But soon the hunter becomes the hunted, and the legendary warrior must wage a fierce, all-out battle against a renegade gang of outlaws and a pack of murderous assassins from his past. Stars Kate Bosworth and Academy Award® winner Geoffrey Rush

programme.title: Death Warrant
programme.desc: In this martial arts action flick, Jean-Claude Van Damme stars as a Canadian Mountie who is assigned to a bizarre case involving the murder of prison inmates. Sent to jail, in the undercover guise of a criminal, he is hot on the trail of the killer until one of his former busts is transferred to the same prison

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Funnyman Andy Samberg stars in his first feature, a zany farce about a development-arrested youth who believes that stunt work is in his blood - despite his many failed, highly hazardous attempts at record-setting on his scooter to the contrary. Sissy Spacek, Ian McShane, Isla Fisher, Jorma Tacone, Bill Hader, Danny McBride and Will Parnell costar in this likable, goofy comedy

programme.title: Houseguest
programme.desc: Under the hot pursuit of loan sharks, with nowhere to run and nowhere to hide, Kevin Franklin (Sinbad) stumbles directly into the break of a lifetime: a friendly family man (Phil Hartman) who thinks that Kevin's an old childhood buddy. Guess who's coming to dinner? Jeffrey Jones, Kim Greist, Stan Shaw, Tony Longo, Mason Adams and Ron Glass costar in this zany domestic comedy

programme.title: Adventures of the Penguin King
programme.desc: Tim Allen narrates this triumphant, comic, coming-of-age tale about Rex, a penguin with a love of epic voyages and adventure who arrives home to his Antarctic birthplace to search for the perfect mate among the city's six million inhabitants

programme.title: Captain Ron
programme.desc: It's high comedy on the high seas as kooky captain-for-hire Kurt Russell helps a family of big city landlubbers break in their new boat-his way! Yes, from stormy seas to modern-day pirates, Mom (Mary Kay Place), Dad (Martin Short) and the kids are in for the Caribbean adventure of a lifetime - whether they want one or not! Benjamin Salisbury, Meadow Sisto, Emannuel Logrono, Jorge Luis Ramos and J.A. Preston co-star

programme.title: The Legend Of Gator Face
programme.desc: Teen pranksters (Johnny White and Dan Warry-Smith) try to put one over on Vernon, Mississippi with their mythical swamp monster, but not unless the real thing has anything to say about it. Paul Winfield costars in this engaging family comedy

programme.title: Wish You Well
programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Becoming Bulletproof
programme.desc: Documentary following the making of a rip-roaring Western costume drama featuring a diverse group of disabled people from across the US, which tells a moving story of big screen barriers and raises questions about why we so rarely see disabled actors on film

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Wilbur
programme.desc: A lonely, stuttering London baker who is still something of a mama's boy despite being his thirties pines for love in this quirky comedy from AFI student Dago Rodriguez

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Worth the Fall
programme.desc: When he witnesses a principal's sexual misconduct toward a student at the middle school where he works, an immigrant janitor must decide whether or not to report the incident - a choice that could get his wife deported

programme.title: Return to Nim's Island
programme.desc: In this sequel, Nim, the precocious daughter of a scientist, still has her gift of being one with nature but now that developers and poachers threaten her island, she and her father must fight to preserve their pristine home and its abundant wildlife. Stars Bindi Irwin and John Waters

programme.title: Arctic Tale
programme.desc: The producers of "March of the Penguins" and "An Inconvenient Truth" team up to present this dazzling documentary that chronicles the endangered life cycles of a walrus and a polar bear, whose frozen habitats are rapidly disappearing thanks to global warming

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Snow Day
programme.desc: A snowstorm means a day of cancelled school for the delighted children of Syracuse, New York, in this hit family comedy from Nickelodeon Movies, starring Chevy Chase, Mark Webber, Emmanuelle Chriqui, Zina Grey, Chris Elliott, Pam Grier, Iggy Pop and John Schneider

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life

programme.title: Latino Filmmaker Showcase: Worth the Fall

programme.desc: When a tragic accident forces a 12-year-old girl and her younger brother to move from New York City to live with their great grandmother on a small farm in Virginia, their new life is threatened by a coal company trying to steal their land. Stars Ellen Burstyn

programme.title: Bella
programme.desc: An international soccer star is on his way to sign a multimillion-dollar contract when a series of events unfold that bring his career to an abrupt end, and when his life intersects with a waitress struggling to make it in New York, both of their lives change irrevocably, turning one ordinary day into an unforgettable experience

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: Documentary that explores the dynamics of what it is to be a man raised by a single mother told through the lens of the director's own relationship with her solo-parented son. Features interviews with men of diverse backgrounds and ages, sharing painfully personal anecdotes in the wake of emotionally turbulent and unsettling periods of their youth. This story is both a deeply personal and introspective portrait of a modern family, as well as a probing cinematic essay examining one of society's major ailments

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington

programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.desc: Couples who seek relationships with other lovers are the focus of this new reality series that follows married Los Angeles grad students Lindsey and Anthony as they reconnect with their ex-girlfriend Vanessa, who wants a formalized commitment to reenter their three-sided romance, and Kamala and Michael, San Diego residents in a ten-year marriage with a four-year-old son and a dozen lovers, who invite another couple, Jen and Tahl, to move in with them

programme.desc: When a struggling artist finds his muse in a sultry singer at an underground nightclub, their daring romance spirals out of control into a dangerous game of deception and betrayal

programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch stars in this tale based on the true story of Alan Turing, a genius British mathematician, who works against the clock to crack Germany's infamously unbreakable codes during World War II and defies convention in his personal life. Also stars Keira Knightley
