programme.desc: On a family trip in the African desert, a research scientist unintentionally travels off course and is brutally murdered by an arms dealer. His girlfriend is put to the ultimate survival test as she attempts to evade the killers and protect his teenage daughter. Stars Stephen Dorff

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: Oscar winner® Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: Liv Tyler and Ben Affleck star in this romantic comedy about a music promoter whose career is sidelined by an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup, leaving him to take care of his precocious daughter. Also stars Jennifer Lopez, Will Smith and Jason Biggs

programme.title: Veronika Decides to Die
programme.desc: Sarah Michelle Gellar stars as a young woman who attempts suicide and wakes up inside a mysterious mental asylum, run by an unorthodox psychiatrist, where she learns that she has only weeks to live

programme.title: Happy Endings
programme.desc: The darkly funny sensibilities of writer-director Don Roos ("The Opposite of Sex") are infused throughout this sprawling tale of dysfunctional family connections broken and remade - between step-siblings who once had a baby, a gay couple trying to win custody of a lesbian couple's child, and a bohemian artist who dumps her boyfriend for his father. Lisa Kudrow, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Jesse Bradford, Jason Ritter, Laura Dern and Tom Arnold star in this twisted, funny take on modern relationships

programme.title: The Dramatics (A Comedy)
programme.desc: When an out-of-work actress unexpectedly lands a starring role in the sexually explicit mini-series adaptation of a best-selling erotic novel, her aimless, stoner boyfriend does his best to be supportive. But when her volatile, Oscar® winning co-lead takes "rehearsals" too far, her dream job becomes her boyfriend's worst nightmare and the couple is forced to decide whether or not their relationship is worth fighting for. Stars Pablo Schreiber

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren

programme.title: Clouds of Sils Maria

programme.title: Cinema Paradiso

This splendid saga stars Jacques Perrin, Salvatore Cascio, Roberta Lena and Mario Leonardi

Mabel Buchman (Janeane Garafolo), grown-up daughter of Paul and Jamie Buchman (Paul Reiser, Helen Hunt), follows in her dad's footsteps by producing a documentary film about her family. Several former series regulars and guest stars make cameo appearances as Mabel tries to trace the progress of her parents' marriage after a startling discovery made by Paul's sister Debbie (Robin Bartlett). programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Academy Award-winning director Brad Bird (Ratatouille) makes his live-action feature directorial debut with the fourth installment of the massively successful Mission Impossible series. The Kremlin has been bombed, and the blame has fallen on the IMF. As a result, the president initiates Ghost Protocol, and accuses Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) and his team of placing the bomb in an attempt to incite a global nuclear war. Now, in order to clear the IMF of terrorism charges, Ethan assembles a new team to uncover the truth by using every high-tech trick in the book. programme.title: Breach
programme.desc: Taut and engrossing fact-based thriller featuring tour-de-force performances by Ryan Phillippe and Chris Cooper. Phillippe plays an FBI trainee who is assigned to keep an eye on a fellow agent (Cooper) suspected of selling information to the Soviets. The film is based on the life of convicted spy Robert Hanssen. Directed by Billy Ray ("Shattered Glass"), who co-wrote the script with Adam Mazer and William Rotko. Laura Linney, Caroline Dhavernas, Gary Cole

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: Philip Seymour Hoffman won a much-deserved Best Actor Oscar for his uncannily astounding performance as "In Cold Blood" author Truman Capote. The exceptional biopic spans the six years Capote spent working on his 1966 masterpiece. Catherine Keener received a Best Supporting Oscar nod as Capote's friend and researcher Harper Lee, who a few years later would publish "To Kill a Mockingbird." Dan Futterman's script was also Oscar-nominated. Clifton Collins Jr., Chris Cooper, Bob Balaban, Amy Ryan

programme.desc: Warm and funny tale starring Robin Williams. An ordinary household is turned upside down when a robot purchased as an appliance starts to develop a heart

programme.title: Terror at the Mall
programme.desc: A look at the Sept. 21, 2013, attack on the Westgate shopping mall in Nairobi, Kenya, by Somali militants that killed more than five dozen people features video footage recorded by surveillance cameras during the siege; and interviews with survivors and rescuers

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen

programme.title: Wild Wild West
programme.desc: Will Smith and director Barry Sonnenfeld last struck gold with the international blockbuster Men In Black and they re-team for this rollicking action adventure movie that puts a brand new spin on the Western. Smith plays government agent Jim West, who finds himself paired with fellow agent Artemus Gordon when Dr Arliss Loveless plots to assassinate the President. Both West and Gordon have their unique talents - Jim is a witty charmer who can talk his way out of any situation, while Artemus is a master of disguise with a dazzling talent for inventing things - and they'll need every trick in the book if they're to outwit their new nemesis. Look out for some spectacular special effects, including a giant transportation device known as The Tarantula, as well as Salma Hayek, who co-stars as the sassy love interest

programme.desc: Sequel to the apocalyptic thriller "28 Days Later" (2002) finds Londoners returning after the killer virus has been eradicated, or has it?

programme.title: The Mistress of Spices
programme.desc: Director Paul Mayeda Berges adapts author Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni magic realist tale about an enchanting Indian orphan who has leaned to harness the magical properties of spices. Orphaned by regional strife in her homeland of India, Tilo (Aishwarya Rai) is subsequently kidnapped by a vicious gang of bandits. A daring escape is quick to follow, and soon after washing up on mysterious shores the traumatized girl is sheltered by a benevolent old woman (Zohra Segal) who reveals to her the remarkable powers of common spices. Later, after moving to Oakland, California and opening her own spice shop, Tilo is compelled to follow three strict stipulations is she is to retain her ability to harness these magnificent powers: she must never use the powers for her own gain, she can never venture outside of her store, and she must never make contact with the skin of another person. When a handsome architect (Dylan McDermott) crashes his motorcycle just outside of the shop and the kindly proprietor rushes to his aid, the instant chemistry between the pair soon finds Tilo's resolve put to the ultimate test

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Political drama based on real-life events about a Texas congressman whose intervention in Afghanistan, supplying weapons and other equipment to rebel troops fighting against the Soviet Union, has far-reaching and unforeseen consequences

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: A real-estate agent's family is stuck in a creepy old house crawling with ghosts

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Jim Carrey and Jeff Daniels reprise their roles as lovable imbeciles Lloyd Christmas and Harry Dunne in this sequel to Dumb and Dumber from original directing duo Bobby and Peter Farrelly. The movie revisits the titular duo of dumb Harry (Daniels) and dumber Lloyd (Carrey), 20 years after the events of the first film: Harry pays his first visit to his parents since the early '90s, and discovers a two-decade-old postcard from a gal he hooked up with (Kathleen Turner) informing him that she's pregnant. It turns out she had a daughter and put the girl up for adoption. Harry is moved by the prospect of having an adult child out there somewhere (and it just so happens that he needs a kidney transplant), so he and Lloyd embark on a road trip to track down his daughter. They get mixed up in many wacky situations along the way, like finding and stealing their old "Shaggin' Wagon," and being duped into pleasuring an old lady in exchange for her hearing aids

programme.title: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
programme.desc: Mr. Fantastic, the Invisible Woman, the Human Torch and the Thing return in this exciting sequel to the 2005 sci-fi hit. This time, the four superheroes encounter a mysterious alien who heralds the arrival of the planet-devouring Galactus

programme.title: Dead Poets Society
programme.desc: Robin Williams toned down his usually manic comic approach in this successful period drama. In 1959, the Welton Academy is a staid but well-respected prep school where education is a pragmatic and rather dull affair. Several of the students, however, have their thoughts on the learning process (and life itself) changed when a new teacher comes to the school. John Keating (Williams) is an unconventional educator who tears chapters of his textbooks and asks his students to stand on their desks to see the world from a new angle. Keating introduces his students to poetry, and his free-thinking attitude and the liberating philosophies of the authors he introduces to his class have a profound effect on his students, especially Todd (Ethan Hawke), who would like to be a writer; Neil ( Robert Sean Leonard), who dreams of being an actor, despite the objections of his father; Knox (Josh Charles), a hopeless romantic; Steven (Allelon Ruggiero), an intellectual who learns to use his heart as well as his head; Charlie (Gale Hansen), who begins to lose his blasé attitude; unconventional Gerard (James Waterston); and practical Richard (Dylan Kussman). Keating urges his students to seize the day and live their lives boldly; but when this philosophy leads to an unexpected tragedy, headmaster Mr. Nolan (Norman Lloyd) fires Keating, and his students leap to his defense. Dead Poets Society was nominated for four Academy Awards, including Best Picture and Best Actor for Williams; it won one, for Tom Schulman's original screenplay

programme.title: Pan

When an intrepid student reporter writes an unflattering article about him, the young man sets out to prove her wrong, falling in love with her along the way

programme.title: Saving Grace
programme.desc: Waking Ned Divine (1998) meets Up in Smoke (1978) in this wacky British comedy about growing marijuana. Grace Trevethan (Brenda Blethyn is a cheerful upper-class housewife and gardening enthusiast who is blithefully unaware of business matters. This all changes when she learns that her husband fell from an airplane without a parachute. Her husband's numerous hare-brained schemes at getting rich quick left their accounts in utter ruin. Worse, if she does not raise 300,000 pounds quickly, she might lose her manor. Out of sheer desperation, she turns to her oddball Scottish gardener Matthew (Craig Ferguson), who suggests growing pot. Grace puts her green thumb to work, and in the blink of an eye the greenhouse is converted into the biggest marijuana farm in Cornwall. Soon, word gets out to the not unsympathetic townspeople, including the local doctor -- who is somewhat of a pot enthusiast -- and a horror flick-loving Vicar. Unfortunately, a nervy French drug lord (Tcheky Karyo) also learns of their scheme and soon starts causing trouble

programme.title: The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel

programme.title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
programme.desc: Wonderfully weird and endearingly eccentric Mr Magorium (played by Dustin Hoffman) is the 243 year old proprietor of a delightfully old-fashioned toy shop that's crammed full of toys to thrill every child. But then this childhood institution is threatened when Mr Magorium decides to move on to his next adventure - death. He leaves the store in the care of Molly, his young assistant. But the shop is not happy, and suddenly the bright colours turn grey, the toys start to malfunction, and the very existence of the Wonder Emporium is threatened. Can Molly and the other employees revitalise the store and save it? The tale of its struggle for survival makes for an inspiring and entertaining feel good movie, packed with great gadgets and excellent performances

Bruce Greenwood, Wendie Malick, M. Emmet Walsh. Other voices include Dustin Hoffman, Mandy Moore, Joe Pantoliano, Whoopi Goldberg, Michael Clarke Duncan, Snoop Dogg, Steve Harvey and David Spade

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A mendacious 14-year-old (Frankie Muniz) seeks revenge on the sneaky Hollywood big shot (Paul Giamatti) who stole his story idea to turn into a film

programme.title: The Secret Garden
programme.desc: The 1993 remake of The Secret Garden is a rendition of the classic Frances Hodgon Burnett novel about a young girl (Kate Maberly) who discovers an abandoned garden on her uncle's large Victorian country estate, as well as an invalid cousin she didn't realize she had. With the help of a local boy, the girl sets out to restore the garden and, once it is blooming again, she discovers it has magical powers

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: Goodnight, Robot. The Electric Company tries to save a literary landmark from destruction

programme.title: Crashbox
programme.desc: No additional information is available

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.desc: A dog and a cat give vocabulary lessons in English and Spanish

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: Based on the popular cartoon character, this family-oriented "ghost story" is about a not-so-scary spirit who bonds with a little girl (Christina Ricci). The eternally irritable Ms. Carrigan (Cathy Moriarty) discovers that the only thing she's been left in her recently departed father's will is a rickety old house in New England. Naturally, the woman is furious about this, until her "close personal friend" and assistant, Dibbs (Eric Idle of Monty Python fame), discovers a secret message that a treasure may be concealed somewhere in the house. The two take off for Maine, only to learn that the house is haunted by Casper "the friendly ghost" and his three ghostly uncles Stinky, Stretch, and Fatso. After futilely recruiting an exorcist (Don Novello, more or less reviving his Father Guido Sarducci character from Saturday Night Live) and a "professional ghost exterminator" (Dan Aykroyd), she brings in a "ghost psychiatrist" (Bill Pullman) and his daughter Kat (Ricci). Innocently attracted to the young girl, Casper befriends Kat as they try to save the ghosts' home from the evil Carrigan. Eye-popping special effects highlight this magical story that touches (albeit lightly) on the theme of what lies at the heart of human desires. Clint Eastwood, Rodney Dangerfield, Mel Gibson and The Crypt Keeper (of Tales from the Crypt) all make cameos as apparitions in the mirror Bill Pullman looks into in the house

programme.title: Racing Stripes
programme.desc: Kids of all ages will jockey for position in front of the TV for this heartwarming and funny family comedy about an abandoned zebra (voice of Frankie Muniz) that yearns to be a Thoroughbred after it is adopted by a Kentucky farm girl (Hayden Panettiere). Bruce Greenwood, Wendie Malick, M. Emmet Walsh. Other voices include Dustin Hoffman, Mandy Moore, Joe Pantoliano, Whoopi Goldberg, Michael Clarke Duncan, Snoop Dogg, Steve Harvey and David Spade

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A mischievous 8-year-old is accidentally left behind in a frenzied rush to the airport for a family holiday in Paris. After learning to fend for himself, the boy has to protect his house against two bumbling burglars who are planning to rob it

programme.title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Movie
programme.desc: Splashy effects power this adaptation of the popular TV series about teen superheroes who battle against the evil Ivan Ooze. Karan Ashley, Johnny Yong Bosch. Red Ranger: Steve Cardenas. White Ranger: Jason David Frank. Blue Ranger: David Yost. Bryan Spicer directed

programme.title: Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Retired male stripper Magic Mike decides to help his friends put on one last show, as the crew embark on a road trip to Myrtle Beach to perform at an exotic-dance convention. Along the way, they brighten the lives of several women in this sexy sequel

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Coming-of-age comedy concerning four high-school friends who vow to lose their virginity by prom night

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: Vinyl connoisseur Rob is shaken from his daily routine of harassing the customers in his record store and compiling lists of greatest hits when his girlfriend dumps him. A sweet-natured, funny film of tunes, girls and boys

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: Juárez. A series spotlighting the work of photojournalists in conflict zones around the world begins in Juárez, Mexico, where Eros Hoagland documents the violence and despair associated with drug trafficking, gang violence and law-enforcement agencies. Hoagland's father, Newsweek photographer John Hoagland, was killed in El Salvador in 1984

programme.title: Antwone Fisher
programme.desc: Antwone is a good seaman but he loses his rag too easily. He's ordered to have counselling with Navy shrink Davenport. Antwone is determined not to talk, but eventually he begins to open up and reveal what is fuelling his rage

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: An exotic break in Mexico turns into a terrifying fight for survival when a group of friends discovers something truly evil lurking in the mystical Mayan ruins

programme.title: The Boy Next Door
programme.desc: A lonely, recently divorced teacher has an affair with a much-younger man. However, their relationship takes a terrifying turn as he grows obsessed with her

programme.title: We Are Marshall
programme.desc: In this sports drama that draws its inspiration from an actual tragedy that occurred in 1970, the West Virginia-based Marshall football team struggles to keep the spirit of the game alive after an airplane crash claims numerous members of the team and coaching staff, as well as local commentators and supporters. Matthew McConaughey, Matthew Fox, and David Strathairn star

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen

programme.title: The 33
programme.desc: Based on a true event, the film follows the 2010 mining disaster incident where a group of thirty-three miners were trapped inside the San Jose mine in Chile for more than two months after a gold and copper mine collapses

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must re-evaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her. Meanwhile, she must make some hard decisions about her ailing father's long-term care

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: For the right price, ex-Special Forces officer Frank Martin will take anything anywhere. He just has three rules: no changes to the plan; no real names; no opening the package... until one package starts to move. Inside it is the beautiful Lai and, although Martin delivers her to the unscrupulous Darren "Wall Street" Bettencourt, his conscience soon gets the better of him and he decides to track down Wall Street and his masters and rescue Lai…

programme.title: Jupiter Ascending
programme.desc: In this sci-fi epic in which human beings are the least-evolved species in the known universe, an ex-soldier protects a seemingly ordinary woman who's been targeted for assassination by a ruthless queen(n)

programme.title: Phil Spector
programme.desc: Al Pacino stars as legendary music producer Phil Spector in this compelling film exploring Spector's relationship with his attorney (Helen Mirren) during his first trial for murder(n)

programme.title: Trespass
programme.desc: Two Arkansas firemen learn from a dying man that he hid a stash of gold in a disused warehouse 50 years earlier in an East St Louis ghetto. When they go in search of the loot, the pair unwittingly observe a murder carried out by the local mob and become targets themselves, especially when it becomes known why they happen to be in the area in the first place(n)

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.desc: Bret Gives Up the Dream. With much reluctance, Bret lands a day-job, but it soon leads to complications with the band(n)

programme.title: The Perfect Weapon
programme.desc: A tough American street fighter stalks the streets of Chinatown in search of the organised criminals who killed his guardian. Action(n)

programme.title: Far From the Madding Crowd
programme.desc: Carey Mulligan, Matthias Schoenaerts, Tom Sturridge, and Michael Sheen star in Thomas Vinterberg's adaptation of Thomas Hardy's beloved novel about an independent woman pursued by a trio of disparate suitors(n)

programme.title: We Are Your Friends
programme.desc: We Are Your Friends is a romantic drama based around one young DJ's dreams to make it big in the electronic dance music genre. Cole (Zac Efron), who dreams about becoming a big player in the music industry, meets James (Wes Bentley), a more established disc jockey who takes him under his wing. After some time, Cole begins to develop feelings for Sophie (Emily Ratajkowski), who is dating James. Eventually, Cole must make some hard choices about his career as he moves close to Sophie, causing a fracture in the relationship between James and himself. The film co-stars Jon Bernthal (The Walking Dead), and is the first film directed by Max Joseph(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) races to solve the mystery of his past while being hunted by members of the very organization he was hired into as director Paul Greengrass brings author Robert Ludlum's popular character back to the big screen for his third feature outing. David Strathairn, Julia Stiles, Joan Allen, and Paddy Considine co-star(n)

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her(n)

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teen to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorized by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge(n)

programme.title: Freeheld
programme.desc: This drama is based on Laurel Hester a New Jersey police lieutenant (Julianne Moore) and her domestic partner Stacie Andree (Ellen Page) who battle to have pension benefits from Hester pass on to her partner after she is diagnosed with terminal lung cancer. Directed by Peter Sollett. Also stars Steve Carell, Michael Shannon, Josh Charles, Luke Grimes, Mary Birdsong and Gabriel Luna(n)

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of professional climbers successfully scale Mount Everest only to be faced with tragedy when a monster storm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent. Jake Gyllenhaal, Josh Brolin, Jason Clarke, and John Hawkes co-star. Directed by Baltasar Kormakur (2 Guns)(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Jason Bourne (Matt Damon) races to solve the mystery of his past while being hunted by members of the very organization he was hired into as director Paul Greengrass brings author Robert Ludlum's popular character back to the big screen for his third feature outing. David Strathairn, Julia Stiles, Joan Allen, and Paddy Considine co-star(n)

programme.title: Appropriate Behavior
programme.desc: A bisexual woman (Desiree Akhavan, who also directed) from a staunchly traditional Persian family attempts to determine why her last relationship failed while staging silent acts of rebellion in response to her brother's recent engagement announcement(n)

programme.title: One Hour Photo
programme.desc: An employee of a one-hour photo lab becomes obsessed with a young suburban family

programme.title: Magic Mike
programme.desc: Veteran male stripper Magic Mike teaches a protégé about seducing women, making big bucks and hard partying in this comedy-drama inspired by Channing Tatum's life before he became an actor

programme.title: Catacombs
programme.desc: An American woman gets lost in an underground maze beneath the streets of Paris, and becomes convinced someone—or something—is chasing her

programme.title: Baby's Day Out
programme.desc: The baby son of the mega-rich Bennington family, evades three incompetent kidnappers on an adventure across Manhattan. Family

programme.title: Simon Birch
programme.desc: Touching drama about the triumph over adversity of the diminutive Simon Birch. He believes that God has a plan for him and voices his opinions forcefully and wittily. While this gets him into trouble with the authorities, he inspires all those around him

programme.title: Hello Ladies: The Movie
programme.desc: Stuart plans to impress his British ex-girlfriend, who's visiting Los Angeles with her husband, by convincing a Russian model to pose as his love interest

programme.title: Brubaker
programme.desc: Robert Redford and Morgan Freeman star in this 1980 release about a new warden in a state-controlled work farm who enters the prison as an inmate. His first-hand experience of the violence he encounters impels him to try to implement reform, not without resistance

programme.title: State of Play
programme.desc: A look at the challenges of balancing professional success in sports and family obligations, focusing on three couples on the field and at home—Mike and Kiya Tomlin; Kevin and DeLana Harvick; and Scott and Megan Lenhoff

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Two young brothers visit an aunt who's an executive at Jurassic World, a theme park populated with genetically resurrected dinosaurs. But chaos erupts when a newly created dino escapes its enclosure, forcing the park's animal behaviorist to save the day

programme.title: Riding in Cars With Boys
programme.desc: Funny and heartwarming tale of a teen mother struggling to raise her son and overcome the feeling that she has made the wrong choices in life

programme.title: The Brothers
programme.desc: Comedy-drama about four friends who ponder love, marriage and interracial dating

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: World of Hurt. A search for Andre's weakness becomes a full-time job for Spencer and Joe; Vernon's anxiety gets the best of him; Jason's pursuit of a client is no easy task; Ricky tries to figure out where his dad is coming from

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: In this psychological thriller based on actual events, a disgraced journalist plays a game of cat and mouse with an accused murderer who assumed his identity while on the run

programme.title: World Championship Boxing
programme.desc: Andre Ward (29-0, 15 KOs) faces Alexander Brand (25-1, 19 KOs) in a light-heavyweight bout in Oakland. Ward defeated Sullivan Barrera in March

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: Twenty-two years after Jurassic Park opened on Isla Nubar, a dinosaur-themed resort attracts thousands of visitors each year, just as John Hammond envisioned. However, following a bad sag in turnout a new effort is undertaken to revitalize Jurassic World, but once again mankind's attempts to interfere with nature bring ominous results

programme.title: Making of 'Jurassic World'
programme.desc: A look at "Jurassic World" (2015), the fourth installment in the "Jurassic Park" series that unfolds 22 years after the 1993 original and features a new dinosaur theme park on Isla Nubar. The film stars Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio, and is directed by Colin Trevorrow

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: Paul Thomas Anderson adapts Thomas Pynchon's celebrated detective novel in this Annapurna Pictures production. Joaquin Phoenix stars as Larry "Doc" Sportello, a pot-smoking private eye at the tail end of the psychedelic '60s who investigates a kidnapping case involving his old flame Shasta Fay Hepworth (Katherine Waterston) and her missing sugar daddy Mickey Wolfmann (Eric Roberts), a powerful real-estate mogul. In the course of his investigation Doc butts heads with Lt. Det. Christian F. "Bigfoot" Bjornsen (Josh Brolin), a part-time actor with a palpable distain for the free-love generation, and a reputation for committing civil-rights violations. Later, as clues to Wolfmann's disappearance begin to suggest a conspiracy involving the FBI and a mysterious underworld syndicate known as the Golden Fang, Doc seeks the help of his lawyer Sauncho Smilax, Esq. (Benicio Del Toro) and Deputy D.A. Penny Kimball (Reese Witherspoon). Meanwhile, Doc also agrees to search for Coy Harlingen (Owen Wilson), a reportedly deceased saxophone player who may not be as dead as rumors suggest, and who seems somehow tied to the ongoing Wolfmann investigation. Martin Short, Jena Malone, and Joanna Newsom co-star

programme.title: Top Ten Monks
programme.desc: A profile of the Cistercian monks at the Stift Heiligenkreuz Abbey, a 12th-century monastery near Vienna, who became a worldwide musical sensation after releasing a chart-topping album of Gregorian chants in 2008

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: Gina Prince-Bythewood's warm and assured debut feature is a charming coming-of-age drama following the lives of Monica Wright and Quincy McCall. Both basketball stars for their respective high-school teams, as their careers progress through college and then into the professional leagues, their romance grows (although not without its ups and downs). The film is not just about shooting hoops but the pressure of being a sports star, the expectations young shoulders are expected to bear, and the familial problems that ensue

programme.title: The Girl
programme.desc: Alfred Hitchcock was at the height of his fame and creativity when, in 1962, he chose an unknown fashion model to star in his most ambitious film, The Birds. But as he sculpted Tippi Hedren into the perfect Hitchcock blonde of his imagination, he became obsessed with the impossible dream of winning the real woman's love. His failure destroyed both of their careers. Screenwriter Gwyneth Hughes has interviewed Tippi Hedren and surviving members of Hitchcock's crew. This film tells their full tragic story

programme.title: Spy
programme.desc: After years of doing work integral to the success of major missions, a deskbound CIA analyst is finally given the chance to go undercover in order to save her missing partner and thwart a global disaster in this uproarious comedy

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Two terminally ill old guys, a tycoon and a mechanic, embark on a things-to-do-before-I-die road trip

programme.title: El amor me queda grande
programme.desc: A 10-year-old boy is in love with a girl two years older who won't let anything stop her from becoming a wealthy writer and critic

programme.title: The Martian
programme.desc: In this thrilling and inspirational sci-fi drama, a lone astronaut is left behind on the hostile surface of Mars, and must use his ingenuity to create a habitat where he can survive. Meanwhile, his crewmates and a team of scientists work to rescue him, in defiance of NASA protocol

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: World of Hurt. A search for Andre's weakness becomes a full-time job for Spencer and Joe; Vernon's anxiety gets the best of him; Jason's pursuit of a client is no easy task; Ricky tries to figure out where his dad is coming from

programme.title: A Beautiful Mind
programme.desc: Troubled Nobel Prize-winning mathematician John Nash is the subject of this compelling Oscar-winning drama. The movie won a total of four Academy Awards

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: No additional information is available

programme.title: The Bucket List
programme.desc: Two terminally ill old guys, a tycoon and a mechanic, embark on a things-to-do-before-I-die road trip

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD

programme.title: Dance of the Dead
programme.desc: When the dead rise from their graves on prom night it's up to the dateless dorks to arm themselves, take on the zombie horde and save the clueless popular kids

programme.title: The Children
programme.desc: After a nuclear power plant leaks poison gas, the children on a school bus are transformed into zombies

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Gritty drama. Mick O'Brien, a teenager from Chicago, must face the ultimate consequence when he is linked to the death of a rival gang member's younger brother

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: In the exciting final chapter of "The Hobbit" series, Bilbo Baggins and his traveling companions get caught up in a war that threatens to destroy all of Middle Earth

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows
programme.desc: This hilarious mockumentary comedy follows four vampire roommates and their immortal struggle to be cool. When they're not looking for their next meal, they're stirring up trouble with the local lycanthropes and bickering over housework

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her

This gripping and ripping spectacle is a blast of stunning computer-generated imagery that details an epic battle set in 480 B.C. about a Spartan king who leads an outmanned force against Persian invaders intent on decimating their foes

programme.title: Lantana
programme.desc: The discovery of a body sparks a murder hunt. Detective Leon is assigned to the case, but he has his own problems dealing with a volcanic temper. His wife goes to therapy, where shrink Valerie questions whether her own frosty husband is having an affair. Intelligent mystery drama

programme.title: El Cantante
programme.desc: Pop icon Marc Anthony steps into the role of Salsa superstar Hector Lavoe in this biopic that follows the singer from his early career success as a Puerto Rican teen sensation to his later status as a New York City Latin idol while also documenting his ongoing struggle against drug and alcohol addiction. Actress and pop star Jennifer Lopez co-stars as Puchi; Lavoe's longtime muse and love interest

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: In this ravishing romantic drama, gifted architect Sabine de Barra is hired to design a section of the elaborate landscaping at the Palace of Versailles for Louis XIV. The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she also must contend with renowned landscaper André Le Notre, with whom she develops both a professional and romantic relationship

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: P.T. Anderson's (Boogie Nights) wonderful ensemble drama with Tom Cruise (nominated for an Oscar), Philip Baker Hall, Philip Seymour Hoffman, William H. Macy, Julianne Moore, John C. Reilly all looking for meaning and happiness in the Valley

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
programme.desc: A fading actor, best known for his portrayal of a superhero, plans a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play in this blisteringly funny showbiz satire. However, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Raucous, crowd-pleasing comedy-drama about a star-crossed quarterback (Burt Reynolds) reduced to calling the shots for a team of convicts in a game against the guards. Eddie Albert. Filmed in Georgia by director Robert Aldrich. Former NFL players Ray Nitschke and Joe Kapp costar

programme.title: Heaven Help Us
programme.desc: Touching, funny and dramatic about youth, rebellion, friendship and self discovery. Set in a 1960s Brooklyn all boys Catholic school, Andrew McCarthy is the new student trying to adapt to life after the death of his parents

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Roberto Benigni's Oscar winner for Best Foreign Language Film plays like two movies: a slapstick comedy and a heartfelt drama. Benigni plays an Italian Jew whose family is taken to a concentration camp, where he concocts a game to protect his young son. Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: This feel-good ensemble comedy tracks a quartet of suburban siblings and their families over the course of a single summer. Hardworking Gil Buckman (Steve Martin) and his stay-at-home wife, Karen (Mary Steeenburgen), have just a few months to help their oldest son, Kevin (Jasen Fisher), overcome his high-strung behavior problems before he'll be relegated to special-education classes. Gil's difficult relationship with his own father, Frank (Jason Robards), has led him to become a would-be super-dad for his three kids, so he takes his son's difficulties more than a little personally. Gil's sister, Helen (Dianne Wiest), is trying to raise a moody, adolescent son (Leaf Phoenix) and an independent-minded daughter (Martha Plimpton) with no help from her well-off ex-husband, who's more interested in his new wife and family. Gil and Helen's sister, Susan (Harley Jane Kozak), meanwhile, must participate in the too-scripted Big Life Plans of her anal-retentive husband, Nathan (Rick Moranis), whose overachiever zeal infects even their toddler daughter. When long-lost brother Larry (Tom Hulce) show up with yet another get-rich-quick scheme, he brings with him a surprise addition to the family. Screenwriters Babaloo Mandel, Lowell Ganz, and Ron Howard negotiate their varied subplots with a deftness and comedic touch that transforms this conflicted clan into a suburban everyfamily

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin finds himself on the run after he is double-crossed on a mission in Russia in this stylised adaptation of the popular video game

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Retired hit man John Wick returns to the fray to punish the gangsters who destroyed his life

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: A medieval peasant poses as a noble to prove himself to be a worthy knight at the country's jousting competition, and finds romance along the way

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: A mysterious, superhuman assassin teams with a young woman to take down a major corporation plotting to use his genetic makeup to create a race of unstoppable killers

programme.title: The Green Inferno
programme.desc: After their plane crashes in the Amazon, a group of young American activists on a mission to save the rain forest are captured by a tribe of cannibals

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: Satan is in town and he has just one thing on his mind - to impregnate a woman with the Devil's spawn before the turn of the Millennium. Can an atheist cop stop him and prevent the apocalypse? Action

programme.desc: Roberto Benigni's Oscar winner for Best Foreign Language Film plays like two movies: a slapstick comedy and a heartfelt drama. Benigni plays an Italian Jew whose family is taken to a concentration camp, where he concocts a game to protect his young son. Nicoletta Braschi, Giorgio Cantarini(r)

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: This feel-good ensemble comedy tracks a quartet of suburban siblings and their families over the course of a single summer. Hardworking Gil Buckman (Steve Martin) and his stay-at-home wife, Karen (Mary Steeenburgen), have just a few months to help their oldest son, Kevin (Jasen Fisher), overcome his high-strung behavior problems before he'll be relegated to special-education classes. Gil's difficult relationship with his own father, Frank (Jason Robards), has led him to become a would-be super-dad for his three kids, so he takes his son's difficulties more than a little personally. Gil's sister, Helen (Dianne Wiest), is trying to raise a moody, adolescent son (Leaf Phoenix) and an independent-minded daughter (Martha Plimpton) with no help from her well-off ex-husband, who's more interested in his new wife and family. Gil and Helen's sister, Susan (Harley Jane Kozak), meanwhile, must participate in the too-scripted Big Life Plans of her anal-retentive husband, Nathan (Rick Moranis), whose overachiever zeal infects even their toddler daughter. When long-lost brother Larry (Tom Hulce) show up with yet another get-rich-quick scheme, he brings with him a surprise addition to the family. Screenwriters Babaloo Mandel, Lowell Ganz, and Ron Howard negotiate their varied subplots with a deftness and comedic touch that transforms this conflicted clan into a suburban everyfamily(r)

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration(r)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically engineered assassin finds himself on the run after he is double-crossed on a mission in Russia in this stylised adaptation of the popular video game(r)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Retired hit man John Wick returns to the fray to punish the gangsters who destroyed his life(r)

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: A medieval peasant poses as a noble to prove himself to be a worthy knight at the country's jousting competition, and finds romance along the way(r)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: A South African mercenary and a fisherman try to recover a priceless diamond amid the civil war in 1990s Sierra Leone(r)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Comic book crimefighter Bruce Wayne takes on Jack, a former hoodlum who remodelled himself after falling into a vat of acid. He's now The Joker, and he's gunning for Gotham City's Batman. Superhero adventure

programme.title: An American Haunting
programme.desc: Chilling horror starring Donald Sutherland (The Hunger Games) and Sissy Spacek (Carrie). Based on the legend of the Bell Witch Haunting of Tennessee, where supposedly a spirit killed a man

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: When US authorities decide not to investigate a terrorist attack on a Western housing compound in Saudi Arabia, outraged FBI agent Ronald Fleury takes matters into his own hands

programme.title: Dragnet
programme.desc: When straight-laced cop Joe's partner quits the job, his new colleague couldn't be more of a mismatch. The unlikely pair must work together to solve a case of mysterious murders

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: When Texas Border patrol officers stumble across a skeleton, a jeep, and $800,000 in cash, they must face the moral dilemma of whether to keep the money for themselves or turn it over to authorities

programme.title: Hard to Kill
programme.desc: Action drama about an LA cop intent on exacting revenge on the corrupt colleagues who shot his family and put him in a coma

programme.title: Formula 51
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson stars as a disgraced pharmacist who invents a potent new street drug in this cracking good action comedy. Jackson plays Elmo McElroy, a kilt-wearing chemical genius who ditches his drug-lord boss (Meat Loaf) and heads to Liverpool to broker a multi-million-dollar deal with an English criminal. But Mr. Loaf sends a hit woman after him

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Alien-hunting agents hunt extraterrestrials bent on destroying Earth in this sequel

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Retired hit man John Wick returns to the fray to punish the gangsters who destroyed his life

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: An Australian farmer goes to Turkey in search of news about his sons, reported missing in action while fighting at Gallipoli

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: Downtrodden caretaker Cleveland Heep is drawn into a dangerous world of 'narfs' and 'scrunts' by Story, an ethereal sea nymph who appears in the residents' pool

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: The Visit is a comedic horror film from director M. Night Shyamalan that follows a pair of children whose lives are changed drastically when their mother (Kathryn Hahn) takes them to visit their grandparents. After seeing their grandparents engaged in activities that they had been kept as a secret to the entire family previously, they are endangered and rendered potentially unable to ever return to their previous existence. The movie co-stars Peter McRobbie and Deanna Dunagan, with music from Hans Zimmer

programme.title: Crimson Tide
programme.desc: A radical group has seized control of a nuclear missile base and the USS Alabama, a state-of-the-art nuclear submarine, has been ordered into action in this taut thriller. But when a fragmented message arrives onboard to launch a defensive strike against the enemy, suddenly a fiery battle of wills erupts between the veteran sub commander - who never questions orders - and his more cautious second officer, who can't help but suspect a command to start a nuclear war. Gene Hackman and Denzel Washington star

programme.title: The Pyramid
programme.desc: Buried deep beneath the Egyptian desert, a team of archaeologists discover ancient lost pyramid unlike any other. After excitedly making their way inside, they realise that they're trapped... and they are not alone

programme.title: Black Card
programme.desc: A missing identification card forces a couple to take a closer look at their culture, identity and place in society. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2015 American Black Film Festival

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A reporter investigates a possible link between the CIA and the importing of cocaine into the US in the 1980s

programme.title: House
programme.desc: In this chilling and suspenseful psychological thriller, two couples seek refuge from a madman in what they think is a deserted house in the woods, but they're right where he wants them. Allana Bale, J.P. Davis, Heidi Dippold

programme.title: Batman: Year One
programme.desc: In this thrilling origin story, Batman (voice of Ben McKenzie) begins his war on crime in Gotham City and decides to join forces with Lt. James Gordon (voice of Bryan Cranston), an honest cop dealing with a corrupt police force. Adapted from the comic-book series by Frank Miller and David Mazzucchelli

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: In this fast-paced caper, a con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: Disturbing thriller about the hunt for a killer known only as 'Casanova' who has kidnapped a number of women and murdered two of them. When a detective's niece goes missing, he is drawn into a complex and highly personal investigation. The local police are unappreciative of his efforts, but his niece manages to escape with valuable information about the killer

programme.title: Peacock
programme.desc: In the tiny town of Peacock, Nebraska, quiet bank clerk John Skillpa prefers to live an invisible life. He may live by himself, but he's never alone John has two personalities. His alter ego is Emma, a well-kept secret -- until now¿ When a passing caboose jumps the rails and comes slamming through John's backyard, the neighbors all race to his aid and are surprised to find Emma. Instinctively assuming she¿s John's wife, they rally around the Skillpas in support. But the harder they try to get closer to Emma, the deeper John slips into psychosis

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Danny Boyle's horror film begins with animal activists releasing monkeys from a research laboratory, little knowing they carry a fatal virus, the 'rage'. Twenty-eight days later, bike courier Jim awakes from a traffic accident-induced coma to find London a deserted ruin, populated by the blood-seeking undead. Meeting up with the uninfected Selena, Frank and Hannah, they set off in Frank's taxi to Manchester, where a group of soldiers led by Major Henry West offer a safe haven. But after surviving the terrors of the journey, on arriving at the encampment, their troubles are just beginning..

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: In this chilling sequel, two young brothers must defend themselves against a malevolent spirit that feeds on the corruption of innocence, and that documents its exploits in home movies

programme.title: Point of No Return
programme.desc: Bridget Fonda stars as a convicted murderer offered a last chance by a secret government agency to become their hired assassin. Based on Luc Besson's stylish thriller 'La Femme Nikita'

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf and Michelle Monaghan star as two strangers who become pawns in a diabolical plot and must work together to prove that they are not terrorists

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, as a diabolical homicide suspect, and Ryan Gosling as the dogged prosecutor on his tail are equally fascinating as they engage in a deadly game of cat and mouse in this absorbing legal thriller. Hopkins is a brilliant engineer who is literally trying to get away with murder---his wife's---and Gosling is the DA whose case is not as open-and-shut as he thought it would be. Directed by Gregory Hoblit

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: The Caped Crusader is called into action again to foil the plans of a grotesque super-villain, the Penguin. Batman's alter-ego, Bruce Wayne, has a yen for a timid secretary - who mysteriously transforms herself into Catwoman, sworn to vengeance against her former boss, one of the Penguin's evil cronies. When a flotilla of missile-carrying penguins advances on Gotham City, Batman needs all the help he can get

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: Agent 47 (Rupert Friend), known only by the barcode tattoo on his neck, is an elite international assassin. Engineered to be an unstoppable killing machine, 47 is contracted by a covert organization to assassinate high-profile targets on a global scale. He's given the assignment to kill the leader of a crime syndicate who wishes to unlock the secrets behind 47's powers and harness that information into an army of highly skilled hit men. As 47 races to complete his mission, new information emerges about his origins and sparks a race against time as the agent is hunted for the secrets behind his skills. Aleksander Bach directs this reboot of the 2007 action thriller Hitman

programme.title: Cold Mountain
programme.desc: Romantic drama, based on the novel by Charles Frazier. Injured during the American Civil War, a wounded soldier deserts the army and embarks on the long journey home to his sweetheart, Ada, in North Carolina. Ada struggles to keep her farm going during the war, but stumbles on good luck when she takes in a feisty wanderer

programme.title: Screwed
programme.desc: Household servant Willard, sick of the meanness of his millionairess employer, snaffles her hound Muffin but botches the job so hopelessly that everyone thinks that he's been kidnapped

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Julia Roberts stars in this coming of age comedy as one of three teenage girls facing tough decisions on life and love while working in a pizza parlour

programme.title: Excalibur
programme.desc: The legend of King Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table is recalled in this adaptation of Thomas Malory's "Le Morte d'Arthur"

programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: George Clooney and two pals escape the chain gang and go on a quest for treasure in 1930s Mississippi. Another shot of comic moonshine from the Coen brothers. (2000)(103 mins)

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: In this powerful adaptation of the best-selling novel, a husband becomes a suspect in his wife's disappearance after she vanishes on their fifth wedding anniversary

programme.title: Waitress
programme.desc: Adrienne Shelly wrote, directed and costars in this charming and bittersweet tale of a pregnant small-town Southern waitress (Keri Russell) hoping to win a pie-baking contest and leave her boorish husband. Nathan Fillion, Cheryl Hines, Andy Griffith, Jeremy Sisto

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: One windy day in New York, Connie Sumner literally bumps into Paul Martel. She's happily married with a child, he's a dealer in rare books. When invited to his flat to repair the damage caused by their sidewalk collision, he makes a move on her, but she declines and leaves. However, she's now intrigued by him and it's not long before she returns to him and embarks on a passionate affair. But Connie's not the best liar in the world, and her businessman husband Ed, thinking her story doesn't stack up, hires a private investigator to keep tabs on her. When the detective's evidence confirms Ed's fears, it thrusts the three main players on the road to tragedy..

programme.title: The Judge
programme.desc: H-shot lawyer must reconnect with his past when his estranged father is suspected of murder

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Two strangers are ripped from their ordinary lives when they are coerced to become part of a high-tech assassination plot. Through blistering chases and shocking twists they try to escape, but where can they go when the enemy is everywhere?

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter joins forces with a witch to stop a plague that could decimate the population of New York City

programme.title: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: Comedy drama. A former CIA agent decides to write his memoirs, but his wife copies his work onto a disc which is accidentally left at a health club. Two unscrupulous employees of the club discover the information and decide to exploit it for their own ends, but little do they realise the extent of the complex and highly dangerous situation they are entering

programme.title: Broadcast News
programme.desc: Intelligent romantic comedy which satirises American television news. A highly- strung news producer finds herself strangely attracted to a vapid anchorman even through she loathes everything he personifies. To make matters worse, her best friend, a talented but untelegenic news reporter, is secretly in love with her. Jack Nicholson appears in an uncredited cameo as another TV anchorman

programme.title: Dim Sum Funeral
programme.desc: After their mother passes away, four estranged siblings return home to attend the traditional funeral she wanted

programme.title: Lost & Found
programme.desc: Comedy starring David Spade as restaurant owner Dylan Ramsey, who is so besotted by his cellist neighbour Lila Dubois that he kidnaps her pet dog just to spend time with her on the subsequent search party. Will his secret be exposed?

programme.title: Less than Zero
programme.desc: Based on the great debut novel by Bret Easton Ellis; Rich kids Andrew McCarthy, Jamie Gertz and Robert Downey Jnr. deal with the drug scene in 1980s La

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: Capra-esque Americana about an Iowa farmer who heeds an ethereal proposition: "If you build it, he will come." So he lays out a baseball diamond in his cornfield, and who should show up but long-dead ballplayer Shoeless Joe Jackson and a squadful of departed Major Leaguers

programme.title: Cop Land
programme.desc: In one of his best roles, Sylvester Stallone plays the sheriff of smalltown Garrison, New Jersey which has been home to a group of corrupt New York cops, led by Harvey Keitel (soon to be seen in Red Dragon), who protects his own when two young innocent blacks are shot by a drunk rookie. Stallone's only hope of getting justice is to team up with Robert De Niro of Internal Affairs in James Mangold's tight thriller

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: After the Battle of Gallipoli, an Australian farmer named Connor (Russell Crowe) is devastated to learn that his three sons have been killed in the melee, so he travels to Turkey to locate and retrieve their bodies for buriel. While there, he discovers the possibility that one of his sons is alive and being held as a prisoner of war

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Emmy-nominee Steve Carell, reprising his role as the polished, preening newscaster Evan Baxter of Bruce Almighty, is the next person selected by God to perform a holy mission in this hilarious comedy. Newly elected to Congress, Evan's life is turned upside-down when God appears and mysteriously commands him to build an ark. But his befuddled family just can't decide whether Evan is having an extraordinary mid-life crisis or is truly on to something of Biblical proportions..

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: Impeccably stylish tale of power struggles in an American city run by a gangster boss and his loyal bunch of tough guys. A complicated plot, which revolves around the boss's right-hand man, incorporates double crosses and brutal murders in a film studded with powerful language, stark contrasts and stunningly recreated 1930s settings

programme.title: End of Days
programme.desc: 1999 proved a banner year for screen portrayals of Satan's love life: first his relationship with Saddam Hussein went under the microscope in South Park: Bigger, Longer and Uncut, and a few months later his search for a girl to settle down with became the basis of this thriller. With the millennium approaching, a series of disturbing signs suggests that Satan (here played by Gabriel Byrne) has returned to Earth and is walking the streets of New York City. It seems that Satan needs to find a woman who will bear his child, as the time for the arrival of the anti-Christ draws near. A woman named Christine (Robin Tunney) believes that she has seen the Devil and felt his presence, and it's up to Jericho Cane (Arnold Schwarzenegger), a former policeman turned elite bodyguard, to keep her safe from The Dark Lord. End of Days was both directed and photographed by Peter Hyams; Kevin Pollak, Renee Olstead, and Udo Kier are among the supporting cast

programme.title: Matchstick Men
programme.desc: Action maestro Ridley Scott ("Alien"; "Gladiator") shifts gears for this witty and intelligent caper about a con artist (Nicolas Cage) whose peculiar psychological problems are compounded when he meets the daughter (Alison Lohman) he never knew he had. Sam Rockwell, Bruce Altman, Bruce McGill, Sheila Kelly, Jenny O'Hara, Steve Eastin

programme.title: Take Me Out to the Ball Game
programme.desc: Two vaudevillian song-and-dance men circa 1906, moonlight as semiprofessional baseball players who both fall for the new female owner, while the more naive of the two falls in with a gambling crowd

programme.title: Neptune's Daughter
programme.desc: The romance between a bathing-suit manufacturer and a polo player is complicated by a masseur who poses as the dashing athlete so that he can woo the swimwear maven's sister

programme.title: Thrill of a Romance
programme.desc: This aquatic musical is set at a mountain resort in the beautiful Sierra Nevadas where a heroic Army Air Corpsman has come for a vacation. There he falls in love with the lovely swimming instructor, who is unfortunately newly married to a rather stodgy businessman. The mayhem begins when her new husband is called to Washington on urgent business. Songs include: "Please Don't Say No, Say Maybe," "I Should Care," "Lonely Night," "Vive L'Amour," "Schubert's Serenade" and "The Thrill Of A Romance."

programme.title: The Law West of Tombstone
programme.desc: Harry Carey and Tim Holt play Barker and the Tonto Kid in an oater that reworks the legends of Judge Roy Bean and Billy the Kid, with the accent on humor. Nitta Moseby: Jean Rouverol. Clara Martinez: Evelyn Brent. Danny Sanders: Allan Lane. Mme. Mustache: Esther Muir

programme.title: Six Gun Gold
programme.desc: A cowboy (Tim Holt) attempts to rescue his kidnapped brother and stop thieves who are stealing gold from miners. Smokey: Ray Whitley. Penny Blanchard: Jan Clayton. Marshal: LeRoy Mason. Brad Cardigan: Lane Chandler. Directed by David Howard

programme.title: Pirates of the Prairie
programme.desc: A deputy marshal (Tim Holt) poses as a gunsmith to expose a group of outlaws terrorizing ranchers. Ukulele Ike: Cliff Edwards. Helen Spencer: Nell O'Day. Lou Harmon: Roy Barcroft. Rufe Jackson: Karl Hackett. Directed by Howard Bretherton

programme.title: Fighting Frontier
programme.desc: An agent (Tim Holt) poses as an outlaw in order to infiltrate a gang and snag its leader. Ike: Cliff Edwards. Jeannie: Ann Summers. Walton: Eddie Dew. Slocum: William Gould. Halverson: Davison Clark. Logan: Slim Whitaker. Directed by Lambert Hillyer

programme.title: Sagebrush Law
programme.desc: Adventure in the Old West. Tim Holt, Cliff Edwards, Joan Barclay, Roy Barcroft. Sam Nelson directed

programme.title: The Arizona Ranger
programme.desc: Western set in the late 1890s. Following the Spanish-American war, a young man returns home after being mustered out of Teddy Roosevelt's Rough Riders. Along with his two pals, he has been given instructions to bring law to Arizona Territory so that it may achieve full state status. His father, however, wants him to stay and help him run the family ranch. To add to his problems, he falls for the wife of a local outlaw

programme.title: Gun Smugglers
programme.desc: In this film, Tim Holt, once again teamed with wise-cracking Chico Rafferty, is working on behalf of the government. His quarry: a gang of mercenary criminals who steal weapons from the U.S. Army, then sell their contraband to sinister enemy agents

programme.title: Masked Raiders
programme.desc: In this film, Texas Rangers Tim Holt and Richard Martin are dispatched to halt a gang of masked outlaws terrorizing the frontier. Holt and Martin learn that the raiders are operating altruistically, robbing from the rich to give to the poor. The real villain, it seems, is the local banker

programme.title: Mysterious Desperado
programme.desc: Tim Holt's second RKO western for 1949 was Mysterious Desperado. Once more teamed with Richard Martin as his saddle pal Chito, Tim rides into a sleepy California town, where Chito hopes to claim his uncle's estate. Tim decides to stick around and investigate when it turns out that Uncle was murdered. The number-one suspect is the victim's son (Edward Norris), but if this were true, the movie would be over in 15 minutes. A clue: when in doubt, always look towards the Evil Land Developers. Director Leslie Selander also contributed to the screenplay of Mysterious Desperado

programme.title: Riders of the Range
programme.desc: Two ranch hands (Tim Holt, Richard Martin) help the ranch's owner clear her brother's name, but they end up accused of murder instead. Dusty: Jacqueline White. Kid Ringo: Tom Tyler. Burrows: Reed Hadley. Directed by Lesley Selander

programme.title: Overland Telegraph
programme.desc: Not to be confused with the 1929 film The Overland Telegraph, this Western from director Lesley Selander stars Tim Holt as a cowboy appropriately named Tim Holt. In order to hinder the construction of a new telegraph line for his own financial gain, scheming shopkeeper Paul Manning (George Nader) enlists the assistance of a gang of outlaws led by Brad Roberts (Hugh Beaumont in one of his many pre-Leave it to Beaver roles). Unfortunately for the bad guys, Holt and his cohort Chito Rafferty (Richard Martin) sense that there's foul play afoot and embark on an investigation. But Holt and Rafferty run into some trouble of their own in the form of Terry Muldoon (Gail Davis), the daughter of the owner of the telegraph company

programme.title: Saddle Legion
programme.desc: Tim Holt, Richard Martin, Dorothy Malone, Robert Livingston

programme.title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
programme.desc: Greed are suspicion and the dominant forces that destroy the lives of three gold prospectors in John Huston's magnificent drama

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The excellent follow-up to Orson Welles' cinema classic 'Citizen Kane'. George, the wilful son of the proud Amberson family, destroys his mother's hopes of marrying her first love, who has become a widower. Refusing to move with the times, he also causes his own financial ruin. Though directed by Welles, the film was actually re-cut and re-shot by others

programme.title: Fifth Avenue Girl
programme.desc: In this social comedy, an aging Manhattan tycoon tires of feeling neglected by his family (who forgot about his birthday) and decides to take drastic steps to rectify the situation. The fun begins when he meets an impoverished young woman in Central Park and decides to take her out on the town. With her consent, he then brings her home and, to upset his family, tries to make it look as if she were his gold-digging mistress

programme.title: Hitler's Children
programme.desc: This modestly produced film version of Gregor Ziemmer's book Education for Death surprised everyone at RKO--and in the film industry--by becoming one the biggest hits of 1943. The "children" invoked in the title are borne on behalf of Adolf Hitler; according to the film, it is standard operating procedure in Nazi Germany for young girls to willingly submit to being impregnated by Aryan men (with or without the benefit of clergy) in order to sustain the "Master Race." Those who refuse are ticketed for sterilization, or worse. One of the holdouts is Bonita Granville, a German girl raised and educated in America whose taste of democracy has made her utterly resistant to Nazism. In the film's key scene, the near-naked Bonita is publicly flogged for her defiance, whereupon Bonita's lover, "good Nazi" Tim Holt, suddenly has an awakening of conscience and stops the whipping. This act of courage results in the executions of both Holt and Granville, but they willingly go to their deaths rather than accede to Hitler's demands. It is true enough that many people flocked to see Hitler's Children because of the sensational, censor-provoking aspects of the film, but equal numbers of filmgoers and critics also recognized the above-average artistic contributions of director Edward Dmytryk and scriptwriter Emmet Lavery (both of whom received substantial cash bonuses for their work on this film). Hitler's Children was the second biggest moneymaker of RKO's 1943-44 season, only slightly behind the Cary Grant vehicle Mr. Lucky

programme.title: The Rookie Cop
programme.desc: In this police drama, a cop tries to explain to his captain that police dogs could be a valuable asset in solving crimes, but the older officer is not convinced until Ace the Wonder Dog shows up and proves his worth

programme.title: Gold Is Where You Find It
programme.desc: A mining engineer falls in love with the daughter of a farmer whose livelihood is threatened by the work on the mine

programme.title: I Take This Woman
programme.desc: Marital woes follow a doctor who weds a beautiful European refugee who still carries a torch for a married man who threw her over

programme.title: Her Highness and the Bellboy
programme.desc: This tender but fluffy romantic comedy centers on the romantic travails of a beautiful European princesss who goes to New York to find the newspaper reporter she fell for when he was visiting her mythical country. She stays at the Big Apple's finest hotel and while there finds herself mistaken for a maid by a sweet-natured bellhop. Charmed by his confusion, she insists that he become her personal escort. She does not realize that the impressionable fellow has fallen in love with her and so misconstrues her every kindness. When not with her, the bellhop is visiting a beautiful invalid, who is secretly in love with him. Meanwhile the princess eventually finds the reporter. She makes him a proposition, but he, believing them to be too different, rejects the offer. Later, she takes the bellhop and goes to the reporter's favorite bar in hopes of seeing him. Unfortunately, the joint gets raided and she ends up in jail until the reporter shows up to bail her out. Soon afterward, she learns that her father has died and that she is now queen. Things get sticky then, as both the bellboy and the new queen find themselves faced with choosing between wealth and power or true love

programme.title: H.M. Pulham, Esq.
programme.desc: MGM was doing so well in 1941 that it could afford the occasional "prestige" film with little box-office appeal. Based on the novel by J.P. Marquand, H.M. Pulham, Esq., stars Robert Young as a successful but stuffy Boston businessman. The glimmer of sadness in Young's eyes indicates that his ascension to the top was not without its cost. In flashbacks, we see how Young considered changing the track his life was on in order to marry Hedy Lamarr. After marrying his wife, however, the man never strays. The film utilizes the Strange Interlude approach of interior monologues heard on the soundtrack, and anticipates Citizen Kane (which hadn't yet been released when Pulham was filmed) by building its entire narrative on the flashback structure. H.M. Pulham, Esq. contains what may well be Robert Young's best performance, though few filmgoers in 1941 were interested enough to see it

programme.title: Crossroads
programme.desc: A blackmailer claims an amnesic diplomat was his accomplice in murder and robbery

programme.title: Tortilla Flat
programme.desc: John Steinbeck's simple tale of life among the poor inhabitants of a California fishing village and how things change when one of them inherits two small houses and allows his friends to occupy one of them

programme.title: Experiment Perilous
programme.desc: Murder mystery in which a rich widow (Hedy Lamarr) finds herself the prime suspect in the investigation into her late husband's sudden death. George Brent is the doctor who comes to her assistance

programme.title: The Conspirators
programme.desc: This espionage adventure is set during WWII and centers on the exploits of the notorious "Flying Dutchman," a fugitive resistance leader from Holland. For the resistance leader, real trouble comes when he is framed for the murder of a fellow agent

programme.title: White Cargo
programme.desc: The once-notorious theatrical chestnut White Cargo was toned down for public consumption in this 1942 MGM-ized adaptation (the property had been previously filmed in England in 1929). More sullen than sexy, Hedy Lamarr stars as Tondelayo, the libidinous African native girl who nearly drives rubber-plantation manager Langford (Richard Carlson) to ruin and madness. Though warned by local English magistrate Witzel (Walter Pidgeon) not to "mammy-palaver" with the natives, Langford falls hopelessly in love with Tondelayo, marrying her in defiance of convention and anti-miscegenation laws. Alas, the restless Tondelayo soons tires of married life, just as Langford wearies of his bride's near-manic possessiveness. She tries to come on to Witzel, who'll have none of it, then plots to rid herself of her husband by systematically poisoning him during a bout of fever. A studio-imposed prologue and epilogue set in the 1940s was inserted to assure the audiences from the outset that Langford would eventually wise up and divest himself of the troublesome Tondelayo. Though corny and campy in the extreme, White Cargo is one of the films for which Hedy Lamarr is best remembered

programme.title: Lady of the Tropics
programme.desc: It's "Never the Twain Shall Meet" time again in the MGM romantic melodrama Lady of the Tropics. The lady in question is half-caste Manon De Vargnes (Hedy Lamarr), a resident of prewar Saigon. American playboy Bill Carey (Robert Taylor) falls madly in love with Manon, but both have their crosses to bear: she is affianced to an Indochinese prince, and he is unable to secure a passport to bring her back to the United States. Adding to the dilemma is influential bureaucrat Pierre Delaroch (Joseph Schildkraut), who agrees to arrange an exit visa for Manon in exchange for a few "favors." Nothing good can come from this, and nothing does

programme.title: The Heavenly Body
programme.desc: When an astronomer neglects his wife in favor of late-night stargazing, her studies in astrology lead her to a handsome interloper

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Age of Umbrage. When Cam's words during an interview are taken out of context, the result is a scandal that envelops the whole family

programme.title: Colors
programme.desc: Crime action film directed by Dennis Hopper about a rookie cop who is taken under the wing of an experienced one as they combat gang warfare in L.A

programme.title: Side Effects
programme.desc: A New York woman commits a horrific act while taking an antianxiety drug, which leads to a criminal investigation of her therapist that digs up possible evidence of past indiscretions

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: Hi-tech action fantasy about the unexpected enemy encountered by a unit of crack commandos on a rescue mission deep in the dense jungles of South America. The routine operation becomes a desperate battle for survival against an alien predator that kills with a fury and efficiency unmatched by any creature on Earth

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: During the Crusades, a blacksmith named Balian has lost his family and nearly his faith. The religious wars raging in the far-off Holy Land seem remote to him, yet he is pulled into that immense drama. Amid the pageantry and intrigues of medieval Jerusalem he falls in love, grows into a leader, and ultimately uses all his courage and skill to defend the city against staggering odds

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Man's Chest
programme.desc: Johnny Depp returns as swaggering Captain Jack for hand-to-tentacle combat with soul-sucker Davy Jones

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centers on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: As Earth cracks under tornadoes, tidal waves and ice caps, scientist Dennis Quaid races to save stranded son Jake Gyllenhaal. Action. Contains violence/flashing images

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Age of Umbrage. When Cam's words during an interview are taken out of context, the result is a scandal that envelops the whole family

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Don't Worry, Baby. A club expansion spreads Ghost thin, between Angela, the children, the business and Tommy. Meanwhile, Tommy faces a tough decision; Kanan returns to the life; and Angela has some doubts

programme.title: 30 Days of Night
programme.desc: The small Alaskan town of Barrow is so far north, it suffers 30 days of full darkness... Which is ideal for a band of vampires, led by Marlow, who descend on the town to feast. Local sheriff Eben Oleson and his estranged wife Stella lead a small group of survivors who hole up in a secret lair but, with supplies running out and the vampires closing in, can they stay hidden or must they risk taking on the undead? David Slade's all-action, visceral horror film mixes fast-moving action with claustrophobic tension as the body count rises and the days slowly pass

programme.title: Power
